 28809 00004A47 E97A01                  	jmp	DEVNAME
 28810                                  
 28811                                  ;Break	<ROOTPATH, FINDPATH -- PARSE A PATH>
 28812                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28813                                  ;
 28814                                  ; Procedure Name : ROOTPATH,FINDPATH
 28815                                  ;
 28816                                  ; Inputs:
 28817                                  ;	Same as FINDPATH but,
 28818                                  ;	SI Points to asciz string of path which is assumed to start at
 28819                                  ;		the root (no leading '/').
 28820                                  ; Function:
 28821                                  ;	Search from root for path
 28822                                  ; Outputs:
 28823                                  ;	Same as FINDPATH but:
 28824                                  ;	If root directory specified, [CURBUF] and [NAME1] are NOT set, and
 28825                                  ;	[NoSetDir] is ignored.
 28826                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28827                                  
 28828                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 28829                                  	; DOSCODE:7F47h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 28830                                  
 28831                                  	; 15/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 28832                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:8C9Dh
 28833                                  
 28834                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:7F82h)
 28835                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:829Eh)
 28836                                  
 28837                                  ROOTPATH:
 28838 00004A4A E8B8FD                  	call	SETROOTSRCH
 28839                                  	; 24/09/2023
 28840 00004A4D 30E4                    	xor	ah,ah
 28841                                  	;CMP	BYTE [SI],0
 28842 00004A4F 3824                    	cmp	[si],ah ; 0
 28843 00004A51 7507                    	JNZ	short FINDPATH
 28844                                  
 28845                                  	;;;
 28846                                  	;; 15/02/2024
 28847                                  	; Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:82A6h
 28848                                  	;mov	word [CURBUF],0FFFFh
 28849                                  	;;;
 28850                                  
 28851                                  ; Root dir specified
 28852 00004A53 A0[6D05]                	MOV	AL,[SATTRIB]
 28853 00004A56 A2[6B05]                	MOV	[ATTRIB],AL
 28854                                  	; 24/09/2023
 28855                                  	;XOR	AH,AH			; Sets "device ID" byte, sets zero
 28856                                  					; (dir), clears carry.
 28857 00004A59 C3                      	retn
 28858                                  
 28859                                  ; Inputs:
 28860                                  ;	[ATTRIB] Set to get through directories
 28861                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Set to find last element
 28862                                  ;	ES:BP Points to DPB
 28863                                  ;	SI Points to asciz string of path (no leading '/').
 28864                                  ;	[SECCLUSPOS] = 0
 28865                                  ;	[DIRSEC] = Phys sec # of first sector of directory
 28866                                  ;	[CLUSNUM] = Cluster # of next cluster
 28867                                  ;	[CLUSFAC] = Sectors per cluster
 28868                                  ;	[NoSetDir] set
 28869                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 28870                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 28871                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 28872                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 28873                                  ;	[CREATING] and [DELALL] set
 28874                                  ; Function:
 28875                                  ;	Parse path name
 28876                                  ; Outputs:
 28877                                  ;	ID1 field of [THISCDS] updated appropriately
 28878                                  ;	[ATTRIB] = [SATTRIB]
 28879                                  ;	ES:BP Points to DPB
 28880                                  ;	[THISDPB] = ES:BP
 28881                                  ;	Carry set if bad path
 28882                                  ;	   SI Points to path element causing failure
 28883                                  ;	   Zero set
 28884                                  ;	      [DIRSTART],[DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM], and [CLUSFAC] are set up to
 28885                                  ;	      start a search on the last directory
 28886                                  ;	      CL is zero if there is a bad name in the path
 28887                                  ;	      CL is non-zero if the name was simply not found
 28888                                  ;		 [ENTFREE] may have free spot in directory
 28889                                  ;		 [NAME1] is the name.
 28890                                  ;		 CL = 81H if '*'s or '?' in NAME1, 80H otherwise
 28891                                  ;	   Zero reset
 28892                                  ;	      File in middle of path or bad name in path
 28893                                  ;		or path too long or malformed path
 28894                                  ;	ELSE
 28895                                  ;	   [CURBUF] contains directory record with match
 28896                                  ;	   [CURBUF+2]:BX Points into [CURBUF] to start of entry
 28897                                  ;	   [CURBUF+2]:SI Points to fcb_FIRCLUS field for entry
 28898                                  ;	   [NAME1] Has name looked for
 28899                                  ;	   AH = device ID
 28900                                  ;	      bit 7 of AH set if device SI and BX
 28901                                  ;	      will point DOSGROUP relative The firclus
 28902                                  ;	      field of the device entry contains the device pointer
 28903                                  ;	   If last element is a directory zero is set and:
 28904                                  ;	      [DIRSTART],[SECCLUSPOS],[DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM], and [CLUSFAC]
 28905                                  ;	      are set up to start a search on it,
 28906                                  ;	      unless [NoSetDir] is non zero in which case the return is
 28907                                  ;	      like that for a file (except for zero flag)
 28908                                  ;	   If last element is a file zero is reset
 28909                                  ;	      [DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM],[CLUSFAC],[NXTCLUSNUM],[SECCLUSPOS],
 28910                                  ;	      [LASTENT], [ENTLAST] are set to continue search of last
 28911                                  ;	      directory for furthur matches on NAME1 via the NEXTENT
 28912                                  ;	      entry point in FindEntry (or GETENT entry in GETENTRY in
 28913                                  ;	      which case [NXTCLUSNUM] and [SECCLUSPOS] need not be valid)
 28914                                  ; Destroys all other registers
 28915                                  
 28916                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 28917                                  	; DOSCODE:7F58h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 28918                                  
 28919                                  	; 15/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 28920                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:8CAEh
 28921                                  
 28922                                      	;entry	FINDPATH
 28923                                  FINDPATH:
 28924 00004A5A 06                      	PUSH	ES			; Save ES:BP
 28925 00004A5B 56                      	PUSH	SI
 28926 00004A5C 89F7                    	MOV	DI,SI
 28927 00004A5E 8B0E[C205]              	MOV	CX,[DIRSTART]		; Get start clus of dir being searched
 28928 00004A62 833E[B605]FF            	CMP	word [CURR_DIR_END],-1
 28929 00004A67 7415                    	JZ	short NOIDS		; No current dir part
 28930 00004A69 3B3E[B605]              	CMP	DI,[CURR_DIR_END]
 28931 00004A6D 750F                    	JNZ	short NOIDS		; Not to current dir end yet
 28932 00004A6F C43E[A205]              	LES	DI,[THISCDS]
 28933                                  	;;;
 28934                                  	; 15/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 28935 00004A73 A1[DC0A]                	mov	ax,[DIRSTART_HW]
 28936                                  	;mov	[es:di+4Bh],ax
 28937 00004A76 2689454B                	mov	[es:di+curdir.ID+2],ax
 28938                                  	;;;
 28939                                  	;mov	[es:di+73],cx
 28940 00004A7A 26894D49                	MOV	[ES:DI+curdir.ID],CX	; Set current directory cluster
 28941                                  NOIDS:
 28942                                  
 28943                                  ; Parse the name off of DS:SI into NAME1. AL = 1 if there was a meta
 28944                                  ; character in the string. CX,DI may be destroyed.
 28945                                  ;
 28946                                  ;	invoke	NAMETRANS
 28947                                  ;	MOV	CL,AL
 28948                                  ;
 28949                                  ; The above is the slow method. The name has *already* been munged by
 28950                                  ; TransPath so no special casing needs to be done. All we do is try to copy
 28951                                  ; the name until ., \ or 0 is hit.
 28952                                  
 28953                                  	;MOV	AX,SS
 28954                                  	;MOV	ES,AX
 28955                                  	; 15/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 28956 00004A7E 16                      	push	ss
 28957 00004A7F 07                      	pop	es
 28958                                  
 28959                                  ;hkn; Name1 is in DOSDATA
 28960 00004A80 BF[4B05]                	MOV	DI,NAME1
 28961 00004A83 B82020                  	MOV	AX,'  ' ; 2020h
 28962 00004A86 AA                      	STOSB
 28963 00004A87 AB                      	STOSW
 28964 00004A88 AB                      	STOSW
 28965 00004A89 AB                      	STOSW
 28966 00004A8A AB                      	STOSW
 28967 00004A8B AB                      	STOSW
 28968                                  
 28969                                  ;hkn; Name1 is in DOSDATA
 28970 00004A8C BF[4B05]                	MOV	DI,NAME1
 28971 00004A8F 30E4                    	XOR	AH,AH			; bits for CL
 28972                                  GetNam:
 28973                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 28974                                  	;INC	CL ; ?*! ; MSDOS 6.0	;AN000; KK increment volid count
 28975                                  
 28976                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 28977                                  	; 16/12/2022
 28978                                  	;inc	cl ; not required !
 28979                                  	
 28980 00004A91 AC                      	LODSB
 28981 00004A92 3C2E                    	CMP	AL,'.'	; 2Eh
 28982 00004A94 7412                    	JZ	short _SetExt
 28983 00004A96 08C0                    	OR	AL,AL
 28984 00004A98 7424                    	JZ	short _GetDone
 28985 00004A9A 3C5C                    	CMP	AL,'\'	; 5Ch
 28986 00004A9C 7420                    	JZ	short _GetDone
 28987 00004A9E 3C3F                    	CMP	AL,'?'	; 3Fh
 28988 00004AA0 7503                    	JNZ	short StoNam
 28989 00004AA2 80CC01                  	OR	AH,1
 28990                                  StoNam: 
 28991 00004AA5 AA                      	STOSB
 28992 00004AA6 EBE9                    	JMP	short GetNam
 28993                                  _SetExt:
 28994 00004AA8 BF[5305]                	MOV	DI,NAME1+8
 28995                                  GetExt:
 28996 00004AAB AC                      	LODSB
 28997 00004AAC 08C0                    	OR	AL,AL
 28998 00004AAE 740E                    	JZ	short _GetDone
 28999 00004AB0 3C5C                    	CMP	AL,'\'
 29000 00004AB2 740A                    	JZ	short _GetDone
 29001 00004AB4 3C3F                    	CMP	AL,'?'
 29002 00004AB6 7503                    	JNZ	short StoExt
 29003 00004AB8 80CC01                  	OR	AH,1
 29004                                  StoExt: 
 29005 00004ABB AA                      	STOSB
 29006 00004ABC EBED                    	JMP	short GetExt
 29007                                  _GetDone:
 29008 00004ABE 4E                      	DEC	SI
 29009 00004ABF 88E1                    	MOV	CL,AH  ; 0 or 1 ; 29/12/2022
 29010 00004AC1 80C980                  	OR	CL,80H
 29011 00004AC4 5F                      	POP	DI			; Start of this element
 29012 00004AC5 07                      	POP	ES			; Restore ES:BP
 29013 00004AC6 39FE                    	CMP	SI,DI
 29014 00004AC8 7503                    	JNZ	short check_device
 29015 00004ACA E9B700                  	JMP	_BADPATH		; NUL parse (two delims most likely)
 29016                                  check_device:
 29017 00004ACD 56                      	PUSH	SI			; Start of next element
 29018                                  	;MOV	AL,[SI]
 29019                                  	; 15/02/2024
 29020 00004ACE 08C0                    	OR	AL,AL
 29021                                  	; 23/09/2023
 29022                                  	;cmp	byte [si],0
 29023 00004AD0 7508                    	JNZ	short NOT_LAST
 29024                                  
 29025                                  ; for last element of the path switch to the correct search attributes
 29026                                  
 29027 00004AD2 8A3E[6D05]              	MOV	BH,[SATTRIB]
 29028 00004AD6 883E[6B05]              	MOV	[ATTRIB],BH
 29029                                  
 29030                                  NOT_LAST:
 29031                                  
 29032                                  ; check name1 to see if we have a device...
 29033                                  
 29034 00004ADA 06                      	PUSH	ES			; Save ES:BP
 29035                                  
 29036                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 29037                                  	;context ES
 29038 00004ADB 16                      	push	ss
 29039 00004ADC 07                      	pop	es
 29040 00004ADD E8E400                  	call	DEVNAME 		; blast BX
 29041 00004AE0 07                      	POP	ES			; Restore ES:BP

 29294                                  ; Procedure Name : STARTSRCH
 29295                                  ;
 29296                                  ; Inputs:
 29297                                  ;	[THISDPB] Set
 29298                                  ; Function:
 29299                                  ;	Set up a search for GETENTRY and NEXTENTRY

 29313 00004BB3 A3[DA05]                	MOV	[ENTLAST],AX

 29316                                  ;BREAK <MatchAttributes - the final check for attribute matching>
 29317                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29318                                  ; Procedure Name : MatchAttributes
 29319                                  ;
 29320                                  ; Input:    [Attrib] = attribute to search for
 29321                                  ;	    CH = found attribute
 29322                                  ; Output:   JZ <match>
 29323                                  ;	    JNZ <nomatch>

 29333 00004BBE 20E8                    	AND	AL,CH			; AL <- SearchSet' and FoundSet
 29334                                  	;and	al,16h
 29335 00004BC0 2416                    	AND	AL,attr_all	; AL <- SearchSet' and FoundSet and Important
 29336                                  ;
 29337                                  ; the result is non-zero if an attribute is not in the search set
 29338                                  ; and in the found set and in the important set. This means that we do not
 29339                                  ; have a match. Do a JNZ <nomatch> or JZ <match>
 29340                                  ;
 29341 00004BC2 58                      	POP	AX
 29342 00004BC3 C3                      	retn

 29356                                  ;Break <DevName - Look for name of device>
 29357                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29358                                  ;
 29359                                  ; Procedure Name : DevName
 29360                                  ;
 29361                                  ; Inputs:
 29362                                  ;	DS,ES:DOSDATA
 29363                                  ;	Filename in NAME1
 29364                                  ;	ATTRIB set so that we can error out if looking for Volume IDs
 29365                                  ; Function:
 29366                                  ;	Determine if file is in list of I/O drivers
 29367                                  ; Outputs:
 29368                                  ;	Carry set if not a device
 29369                                  ;	ELSE
 29370                                  ;	Zero flag set
 29371                                  ;	BH = Bit 7,6 = 1, bit 5 = 0 (cooked mode)
 29372                                  ;	     bits 0-4 set from low byte of attribute word
 29373                                  ;	DEVPT = DWORD pointer to Device header of device
 29374                                  ; BX destroyed, others preserved
 29375                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29376

 29404 00004BE2 F6440580                	test	byte [SI+SYSDEV.ATT+1],(DEVTYP>>8)
 29405                                  	;;test	word [si+4],8000h
 29406                                  	;TEST	word [SI+SYSDEV.ATT],DEVTYP
 29407 00004BE6 7410                    	JZ	short SKIPDEV 		; Skip block devices (NET and LOCAL)

 29448                                  ;BREAK <Build_device_ent - Make a Directory entry>
 29449                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29450                                  ; Procedure Name : Build_device_ent
 29451                                  ;
 29452                                  ; Inputs:
 29453                                  ;	[NAME1] has name
 29454                                  ;	BH is attribute field (supplied by DEVNAME)
 29455                                  ;	[DEVPT] points to device header (supplied by DEVNAME)
 29456                                  ; Function:
 29457                                  ;	Build a directory entry for a device at DEVFCB
 29458                                  ; Outputs:
 29459                                  ;	BX points to DEVFCB
 29460                                  ;	SI points to dir_first field
 29461                                  ;	AH = input BH
 29462                                  ;	AL = 0
 29463                                  ;	dir_first = DEVPT
 29464                                  ;	Zero Set, Carry Clear
 29465                                  ; DS,ES,BP preserved, others destroyed
 29466                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29467                                  
 29468                                  Build_device_ent:
 29469 00004C22 B82020                  	MOV	AX,"  " ; 2020h
 29470                                  
 29471                                  ;hkn; DEVFCB is in DOSDATA

 29473                                  
 29474                                  ;	Fill dir_ext  BUGBUG - use ERRNZs for this stuff!
 29475                                  
 29476 00004C28 AB                      	STOSW
 29477 00004C29 AA                      	STOSB				; Blank out extent field
 29478                                  	;mov	al,40h

 29480

 29482

 29495

 29497

 29500                                  
 29501                                  ; Fill dir_date
 29502

 29508

 29512                                  ; Fill dir_size_l
 29513                                  ;
 29514 00004C47 AB                      	STOSW
 29515 00004C48 88FC                    	MOV	AH,BH			; Put device atts in AH
 29516                                  
 29517                                  ;hkn; DEVFCB is in DOSDATA
 29518 00004C4A BB[4B05]                	MOV	BX,DEVFCB
 29519 00004C4D 30C0                    	XOR	AL,AL			; Set zero, clear carry
 29520 00004C4F C3                      	retn

 29523                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29524                                  ;
 29525                                  ;   ValidateCDS - Get current CDS. Splice it. Call FatReadCDS to check
 29526                                  ;   media. If media has been changed, do DOS_Chdir to validate path.
 29527                                  ;   If invalid, reset original CDS to root.
 29528                                  ;
 29529                                  ;   Inputs:	ThisCDS points to CDS of interest
 29530                                  ;		SS:DI points to temp buffer
 29531                                  ;   Outputs:	The current directory string is validated on the appropriate
 29532                                  ;		    drive
 29533                                  ;		ThisDPB changed
 29534                                  ;		ES:DI point to CDS
 29535                                  ;		Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 29536                                  ;   Registers modified: all
 29537                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 29539                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)

 29720                                  ; 28/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 29721                                  ; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - offset 43BDh
 29722                                  
 29723                                  ;Break	<CheckThisDevice - Check for being a device>
 29724                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29725                                  ;
 29726                                  ;   CheckThisDevice - Examine the area at DS:SI to see if there is a valid
 29727                                  ;   device specified. We will return carry if there is a device present. 
 29728                                  ;   The forms of devices we will recognize are:
 29729                                  ;
 29730                                  ;	[path]device
 29731                                  ;
 29732                                  ;   Note that the drive letter has *already* been removed. All other forms
 29733                                  ;   are not considered to be devices. If such a device is found we change
 29734                                  ;   the source pointer to point to the device component.
 29735                                  ;
 29736                                  ;   Inputs:	ES is DOSDATA
 29737                                  ;		DS:SI contains name
 29738                                  ;   Outputs:	ES is DOSDATA
 29739                                  ;		DS:SI point to name or device
 29740                                  ;		Carry flag set if device was found
 29741                                  ;		Carry flag reset otherwise
 29742                                  ;   Registers Modified: all except ES:DI, DS
 29743                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29744                                  
 29745                                  CheckThisDevice:
 29746 00004D1D 57                      	push	di
 29747 00004D1E 56                      	push	si
 29748 00004D1F 89F7                    	MOV	DI,SI
 29749                                  
 29750                                  ; Check for presence of \dev\ (Dam multiplan!)
 29751                                  
 29752 00004D21 8A04                    	MOV	AL,[SI]
 29753 00004D23 E8330D                  	call	PATHCHRCMP		; is it a path char?
 29754 00004D26 7517                    	JNZ	short ParseDev		; no, go attempt to parse device
 29755 00004D28 46                      	INC	SI			; simulate LODSB
 29756                                  
 29757                                  ; We have the leading path separator. Look for DEV part.
 29758                                  
 29759 00004D29 AD                      	LODSW
 29760 00004D2A 0D2020                  	OR	AX,2020h
 29761 00004D2D 3D6465                  	cmp	ax,"de"
 29762                                  	;CMP	AX,"e"<< 8 + "d"
 29763 00004D30 752D                    	JNZ	short NotDevice		; not "de", assume not device
 29764 00004D32 AC                      	LODSB
 29765 00004D33 0C20                    	OR	AL,20h
 29766 00004D35 3C76                    	CMP	AL,"v"                  ; Not "v", assume not device
 29767 00004D37 7526                    	JNZ	short NotDevice
 29768 00004D39 AC                      	LODSB
 29769 00004D3A E81C0D                  	call	PATHCHRCMP		; do we have the last path separator?
 29770 00004D3D 7520                    	JNZ	short NotDevice		; no. go for it.
 29771                                  
 29772                                  ; DS:SI now points to a potential drive. Preserve them as NameTrans advances
 29773                                  ; SI and DevName may destroy DS.
 29774                                  
 29775                                  ParseDev:
 29776 00004D3F 1E                      	push	ds
 29777 00004D40 56                      	push	si			; preserve the source pointer
 29778 00004D41 E8590C                  	call	NameTrans		; advance DS:SI
 29779 00004D44 803C00                  	CMP	BYTE [SI],0		; parse entire string?
 29780 00004D47 F9                      	STC				; simulate a Carry return from DevName
 29781 00004D48 750B                    	JNZ	short SkipSearch	; no parse. simulate a file return.
 29782                                  
 29783                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 29784 00004D4A 16                      	push	ss
 29785 00004D4B 1F                      	pop	ds
 29786                                  
 29787                                  ; M026 - start - fix ported from ROMDOS2 for bug # 2849
 29788                                  ;
 29789                                  ; SR;
 29790                                  ; We have to set Attrib before invoking DevName. Otherwise, the value from
 29791                                  ; a previous DOS call is used and DevName thinks it is not a device if the
 29792                                  ; old call set the volume attribute bit.
 29793                                  
 29794 00004D4C A0[6D05]                	mov	al,[SATTRIB]
 29795 00004D4F A2[6B05]                	mov	[ATTRIB],al		;set Attrib for DevName
 29796                                  
 29797                                  ; M026 - end
 29798                                  
 29799 00004D52 E86FFE                  	call	DEVNAME
 29800                                  
 29801                                  SkipSearch:
 29802 00004D55 5E                      	pop	si
 29803 00004D56 1F                      	pop	ds
 29804                                  
 29805                                  ; SI points to the beginning of the potential device. If we have a device
 29806                                  ; then we do not change SI. If we have a file, then we reset SI back to the
 29807                                  ; original value. At this point Carry set indicates FILE.
 29808                                  
 29809                                  CheckReturn:
 29810 00004D57 5F                      	pop	di			; get original SI
 29811 00004D58 7302                    	JNC	short Check_Done	; if device then do not reset pointer
 29812 00004D5A 89FE                    	MOV	SI,DI
 29813                                  Check_Done:
 29814 00004D5C 5F                      	pop	di
 29815 00004D5D F5                      	CMC				; invert carry. Carry => device
 29816 00004D5E C3                      	retn
 29817                                  NotDevice:
 29818 00004D5F F9                      	STC
 29819 00004D60 EBF5                    	JMP	short CheckReturn
 29820

 29870                                  ;Break	<IOFUNC -- DO FUNCTION 1-12 I/O>
 29871                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29872                                  ;
 29873                                  ; Procedure Name : IOFUNC
 29874                                  ;
 29875                                  ; Inputs:
 29876                                  ;	DS:SI Points to SFT
 29877                                  ;	AH is function code
 29878                                  ;		= 0 Input
 29879                                  ;		= 1 Input Status
 29880                                  ;		= 2 Output
 29881                                  ;		= 3 Output Status
 29882                                  ;		= 4 Flush
 29883                                  ;		= 5 Input Status - System WAIT invoked for K09 if no char
 29884                                  ;				   present.
 29885                                  ;	AL = character if output
 29886                                  ; Function:
 29887                                  ;	Perform indicated I/O to device or file
 29888                                  ; Outputs:
 29889                                  ;	AL is character if input
 29890                                  ;	If a status call
 29891                                  ;		zero set if not ready
 29892                                  ;		zero reset if ready (character in AL for input status)
 29893                                  ; For regular files:
 29894                                  ;	Input Status
 29895                                  ;		Gets character but restores position
 29896                                  ;		Zero set on EOF
 29897                                  ;	Input
 29898                                  ;		Gets character advances position
 29899                                  ;		Returns ^Z on EOF
 29900                                  ;	Output Status
 29901                                  ;		Always ready
 29902                                  ; AX altered, all other registers preserved
 29903                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29904

 30485

 30516                                  SETCALLHEAD:

 30518 00004FC9 16                      	PUSH	SS
 30519 00004FCA 07                      	POP	ES
 30520                                  					; DEVCALL is in DOSDATA
 30521 00004FCB BF[5A03]                	MOV	DI,DEVCALL
 30522                                  
 30523 00004FCE AA                      	STOSB				; length
 30524 00004FCF 58                      	POP	AX			; 
 30525 00004FD0 AA                      	STOSB				; Unit
 30526 00004FD1 50                      	PUSH	AX

 30528 00004FD4 AA                      	STOSB				; Command code
 30529 00004FD5 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX
 30530 00004FD7 AB                      	STOSW				; Status
 30531 00004FD8 83C708                  	ADD	DI,8			; Skip link fields

 30533 00004FDC 86C4                    	XCHG	AH,AL

 30550 00004FEE 87CA                    	XCHG	DX,CX

 30558                                  
 30559                                  ; Inputs:

 30561                                  ;	CX = Record Count
 30562                                  ;	DX = Starting Record
 30563                                  ;	AH = Media Byte

 30575 00004FFA 36020E[FF02]            	ADD	CL,[SS:VERFLG]		; SS override

 30579                                  %if 0	; SC
 30580                                  
 30581                                  ; 30/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30582                                  ; DOSCODE:86A8h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 30583                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 30584                                  ; DOSCODE:866Dh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 30585                                  
 30586                                  ;Break	<RW_SC -- Read Write Secondary Cache>
 30587                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30588                                  ;
 30589                                  ; Procedure Name : RW_SC
 30590                                  ;
 30591                                  ; Inputs:
 30592                                  ;	 [SC_CACHE_COUNT]= secondary cache count
 30593                                  ;	 [SC_STATUS]= SC validity status
 30594                                  ;	 [SEQ_SECTOR]= last sector read
 30595                                  ; Function:
 30596                                  ;	Read from or write through secondary cache
 30597                                  ; Output:
 30598                                  ;	ES:BX Points to DEVCALL
 30599                                  ;	carry clear, I/O is not done
 30600                                  ;		     [SC_FLAG]=1 if continuos sectors will be read
 30601                                  ;	carry set, I/O is done
 30602                                  ;
 30603                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30604                                  
 30605                                  RW_SC:
 30606                                  	; SS override for all variables used.
 30607                                  	
 30608                                  	CMP	word [ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT],0  ;AN000;LB. secondary cache exists?
 30609                                  	JZ	short scexit4		    ;AN000;LB. no, do nothing
 30610                                  	CMP	word [ss:CALLSCNT],1	    ;AN000;LB. sector count = 1 (buffer I/O)
 30611                                  	JNZ	short scexit4 		    ;AN000;LB. no, do nothing
 30612                                  	PUSH	CX			    ;AN000;LB.
 30613                                  	PUSH	DX			    ;AN000;LB. yes
 30614                                  	PUSH	DS			    ;AN000;LB. save registers
 30615                                  	PUSH	SI			    ;AN000;LB.
 30616                                  	PUSH	ES			    ;AN000;LB.
 30617                                  	PUSH	DI			    ;AN000;LB.
 30618                                  
 30619                                  	MOV	DX,[ss:CALLSSEC]	    ;AN000;LB. starting sector
 30620                                  	CMP	BYTE [ss:DEVCALL_REQFUNC],DEVRD ;AN000;LB. read ?
 30621                                  	JZ	short doread		    ;AN000;LB. yes
 30622                                  	CALL	INVALIDATE_SC		    ;AN000;LB. invalidate SC
 30623                                  	JMP	scexit2 		    ;AN000;LB. back to normal
 30624                                  scexit4:				    ;AN000;
 30625                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;LB. I/O not done yet
 30626                                  	retn				    ;AN000;LB.
 30627                                  doread: 				    ;AN000;
 30628                                  	CALL	SC2BUF			    ;AN000;LB. check if in SC
 30629                                  	JC	short readSC		    ;AN000;LB.
 30630                                  	MOV	word [ss:DEVCALL_REQSTAT],STDON ;AN000;LB. fake done and ok
 30631                                  	STC				    ;AN000;LB. set carry
 30632                                  	JMP	short saveseq 		    ;AN000;LB. save seq. sector #
 30633                                  readSC: 				    ;AN000;
 30634                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]   	    ;AN000;LB. subtract sector num from
 30635                                  	MOV	CX,[ss:CALLSSEC]	    ;AN000;LB. saved sequential sector
 30636                                  	SUB	CX,[ss:SEQ_SECTOR]    	    ;AN000;LB. number
 30637                                  	SBB	AX,[ss:SEQ_SECTOR+2]  	    ;AN000;LB.
 30638                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30639                                  	;CMP	AX,0			    ;AN000;LB. greater than 64K
 30640                                  	JNZ	short saveseq2		    ;AN000;LB. yes,save seq. sector #
 30641                                  chklow: 						
 30642                                  	CMP	CX,1			    ;AN000;LB. <= 1
 30643                                  	JA	short saveseq2		    ;AN000;LB. no, not sequential
 30644                                  	MOV	word [ss:SC_STATUS],-1	    ;AN000;LB. presume all SC valid
 30645                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT]	    ;AN000;LB. yes, sequential
 30646                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLSCNT],AX	    ;AN000;LB. read continuous sectors
 30647                                  readsr:
 30648                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:CALLXAD+2]	    ;AN000;LB. save buffer addr
 30649                                  	MOV	[ss:TEMP_VAR2],AX	    ;AN000;LB. in temp vars
 30650                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:CALLXAD]	    	    ;AN000;LB.
 30651                                  	MOV	[ss:TEMP_VAR],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 30652                                  
 30653                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR]	    ;AN000;LB. use SC cache addr as
 30654                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLXAD],AX		    ;AN000;LB. transfer addr
 30655                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR+2]	    ;AN000;LB.
 30656                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLXAD+2],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 30657                                  	MOV	byte [ss:SC_FLAG],1	    ;AN000;LB. flag it for later;
 30658                                  	MOV	AL,[ss:SC_DRIVE]	    ;AN000;LB. current drive
 30659                                  	MOV	[ss:CurSC_DRIVE],AL	    ;AN000;LB. set current drive
 30660                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:CALLSSEC]	    ;AN000;LB. current sector
 30661                                  	MOV	[ss:CurSC_SECTOR],AX	    ;AN000;LB. set current sector
 30662                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]	    ;AN000;LB.
 30663                                  	MOV	[ss:CurSC_SECTOR+2],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 30664                                  saveseq2:				    ;AN000;
 30665                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;LB. clear carry
 30666                                  saveseq:				    ;AN000;	
 30667                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]	    ;AN000;LB. save current sector #
 30668                                  	MOV	[ss:SEQ_SECTOR+2],AX	    ;AN000;LB. for access mode ref.
 30669                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:CALLSSEC]	    ;AN000;LB.	
 30670                                  	MOV	[ss:SEQ_SECTOR],AX 	    ;AN000;LB.	
 30671                                  	JMP	short scexit 		    ;AN000;LB.	
 30672                                  scexit2:				    ;AN000;LB.
 30673                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;LB.	clear carry
 30674                                  scexit: 				    ;AN000;		
 30675                                  	POP	DI			    ;AN000;LB.
 30676                                  	POP	ES			    ;AN000;LB. restore registers
 30677                                  	POP	SI			    ;AN000;LB.
 30678                                  	POP	DS			    ;AN000;LB.
 30679                                  	POP	DX			    ;AN000;LB.
 30680                                  	POP	CX			    ;AN000;LB.
 30681                                  	retn				    ;AN000;LB.
 30682                                  
 30683                                  ;Break	<IN_SC -- check if in secondary cache>
 30684                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30685                                  ;
 30686                                  ; Procedure Name : IN_SC
 30687                                  ;
 30688                                  ; Inputs:  [SC_DRIVE]= requesting drive
 30689                                  ;	   [CURSC_DRIVE]= current SC drive
 30690                                  ;	   [CURSC_SECTOR]= starting scetor # of SC
 30691                                  ;	   [SC_CACHE_COUNT]= SC count
 30692                                  ;	   [HIGH_SECTOR]:DX= sector number
 30693                                  ; Function:
 30694                                  ;	Check if the sector is in secondary cache
 30695                                  ; Output:
 30696                                  ;	carry clear, in SC
 30697                                  ;	   CX= the index in the secondary cache
 30698                                  ;	carry set, not in SC
 30699                                  ;
 30700                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30701                                  
 30702                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 30703                                  IN_SC:
 30704                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 30705                                  	MOV	AL,[ss:SC_DRIVE]	    ;AN000;;LB. current drive
 30706                                  	CMP	AL,[ss:CurSC_DRIVE]	    ;AN000;;LB. same as SC drive
 30707                                  	JNZ	short outrange2		    ;AN000;;LB. no
 30708                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]	    ;AN000;;LB. subtract sector num from
 30709                                  	MOV	CX,DX			    ;AN000;;LB. secondary starting sector
 30710                                  	SUB	CX,[ss:CurSC_SECTOR]        ;AN000;;LB. number
 30711                                  	SBB	AX,[ss:CurSC_SECTOR+2]      ;AN000;;LB.
 30712                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30713                                  	;CMP	AX,0			    ;AN000;;LB. greater than 64K
 30714                                  	JNZ	short outrange2		    ;AN000;;LB. yes
 30715                                  	CMP	CX,[ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT]	    ;AN000;;LB. greater than SC count
 30716                                  	JAE	short outrange2		    ;AN000;;LB. yes
 30717                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;;LB. clear carry
 30718                                  	;JMP	short inexit		    ;AN000;;LB. in SC
 30719                                  	; 16/12/2022
 30720                                  	retn	; 30/04/2019
 30721                                  	; 22/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 30722                                  	;jmp	short inexit
 30723                                  
 30724                                  outrange2:				    ;AN000;;LB. set carry
 30725                                  	STC				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30726                                  inexit: 				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30727                                  	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30728                                  
 30729                                  ;Break	<INVALIDATE_SC - invalide secondary cache>
 30730                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30731                                  ;
 30732                                  ; Procedure Name : Invalidate_Sc
 30733                                  ;
 30734                                  ; Inputs:  [SC_DRIVE]= requesting drive
 30735                                  ;	   [CURSC_DRIVE]= current SC drive
 30736                                  ;	   [CURSC_SECTOR]= starting scetor # of SC
 30737                                  ;	   [SC_CACHE_COUNT]= SC count
 30738                                  ;	   [SC_STATUS]= SC status word
 30739                                  ;	   [HIGH_SECTOR]:DX= sector number
 30740                                  ;
 30741                                  ; Function:
 30742                                  ;	invalidate secondary cache if in there
 30743                                  ; Output:
 30744                                  ;	[SC_STATUS] is updated
 30745                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30746                                  
 30747                                  INVALIDATE_SC:
 30748                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 30749                                  
 30750                                  	CALL	IN_SC			    ;AN000;;LB. in secondary cache
 30751                                  	JC	short outrange		    ;AN000;;LB. no
 30752                                  	MOV	AX,1			    ;AN000;;LB. invalidate the sector
 30753                                  	SHL	AX,CL			    ;AN000;;LB. in the secondary cache
 30754                                  	NOT	AX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30755                                  	AND	[ss:SC_STATUS],AX	    ;AN000;;LB. save the status
 30756                                  outrange:				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30757                                  	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30758                                  
 30759                                  ; DOSCODE:87A5h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 30760                                  ; 22/11/2022
 30761                                  ; DOSCODE:876Ah (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 30762                                  
 30763                                  ;Break	<VIRREAD- virtually read data into buffer>
 30764                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30765                                  ;
 30766                                  ; Procedure Name : SC_FLAG
 30767                                  ;
 30768                                  ; Inputs:  SC_FLAG = 0, no sectors were read into SC
 30769                                  ;		     1, continuous sectors were read into SC
 30770                                  ; Function:
 30771                                  ;	   Move data from SC to buffer
 30772                                  ; Output:
 30773                                  ;	 carry clear, data is moved to buffer
 30774                                  ;	 carry set, bad sector or exceeds maximum sector
 30775                                  ;	   SC_FLAG =0
 30776                                  ;	   CALLSCNT=1
 30777                                  ;	   SC_STATUS= -1 if succeeded
 30778                                  ;     
 30779                                  ;		       0 if failed
 30780                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30781                                  
 30782                                  VIRREAD:
 30783                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 30784                                  
 30785                                  	CMP	byte [ss:SC_FLAG],0	    ;AN000;;LB. from SC fill
 30786                                  	JZ	short sc2end		    ;AN000;;LB. no
 30787                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:TEMP_VAR2]	    ;AN000;;LB. restore buffer addr
 30788                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLXAD+2],AX	    ;AN000;;LB.
 30789                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:TEMP_VAR]	    ;AN000;;LB.
 30790                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLXAD],AX		    ;AN000;;LB.
 30791                                  	MOV	byte [ss:SC_FLAG],0	    ;AN000;;LB. reset sc_flag
 30792                                  	MOV	word [ss:CALLSCNT],1	    ;AN000;;LB. one sector transferred
 30793                                  
 30794                                  	;TEST	word [SS:DEVCALL_REQSTAT],STERR ;AN000;;LB. error?
 30795                                  	test	byte [ss:DEVCALL_REQSTAT+1],(STERR>>8) ; 80h
 30796                                  	JNZ	short scerror 		    ;AN000;;LB. yes
 30797                                  	PUSH	DS			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30798                                  	PUSH	SI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30799                                  	PUSH	ES			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30800                                  	PUSH	DI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30801                                  	PUSH	DX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30802                                  	PUSH	CX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30803                                  	XOR	CX,CX			    ;AN000;;LB. we want first sector in SC
 30804                                  	CALL	SC2BUF2 		    ;AN000;;LB. move data from SC to buf
 30805                                  	POP	CX
 30806                                  	POP	DX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30807                                  	POP	DI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30808                                  	POP	ES			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30809                                  	POP	SI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30810                                  	POP	DS			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30811                                  	JMP	SHORT sc2end		    ;AN000;;LB. return
 30812                                  scerror:				    ;AN000;
 30813                                  	MOV	word [ss:CALLSCNT],1	    ;AN000;;LB. reset sector count to 1
 30814                                  	MOV	word [ss:SC_STATUS],0	    ;AN000;;LB. invalidate all SC sectors
 30815                                  	MOV	byte [ss:CurSC_DRIVE],-1    ;AN000;;LB. invalidate drive
 30816                                  	STC				    ;AN000;;LB. carry set
 30817                                  	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30818                                  sc2end: 				    ;AN000;
 30819                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;;LB. carry clear
 30820                                  	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30821                                  
 30822                                  ; 30/04/2019 - Retro  DOS v4.0
 30823                                  ; DOSCODE:87FDh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 30824                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 30825                                  ; DOSCODE:87C2h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 30826                                  
 30827                                  ;Break	<SC2BUF- move data from SC to buffer>
 30828                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30829                                  ;
 30830                                  ; Procedure Name : SC2BUF
 30831                                  ;
 30832                                  ; Inputs:  [SC_STATUS] = SC validity status
 30833                                  ;	   [SC_SECTOR_SIZE] = request sector size
 30834                                  ;	   [SC_CACHE_PTR] = pointer to SC
 30835                                  ; Function:
 30836                                  ;	   Move data from SC to buffer
 30837                                  ; Output:
 30838                                  ;	   carry clear, in SC  and data is moved
 30839                                  ;	   carry set, not in SC and data is not moved
 30840                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30841                                  
 30842                                  SC2BUF:
 30843                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 30844                                  	CALL	IN_SC			    ;AN000;LB. in secondary cache
 30845                                  	;JC	short noSC		    ;AN000;LB. no
 30846                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30847                                  	jc	short sexit
 30848                                  	MOV	AX,1			    ;AN000;LB. check if valid sector
 30849                                  	SHL	AX,CL			    ;AN000;LB. in the secondary cache
 30850                                  	TEST	[ss:SC_STATUS],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 30851                                  	JZ	short noSC		    ;AN000;LB. invalid
 30852                                  ;entry SC2BUF2
 30853                                  SC2BUF2:				    ;AN000;
 30854                                  	;MOV	AX,CX			    ;AN000;LB. times index with
 30855                                  	;MUL	word [ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]    ;AN000;LB. sector size
 30856                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30857                                  	mov	ax,[ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]
 30858                                  	xchg	ax,cx ; cx = [ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]
 30859                                  	mul	cx
 30860                                  	ADD	AX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR]	    ;AN000;LB. add SC starting addr
 30861                                  	ADC	DX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR+2]	    ;AN000;LB.
 30862                                  	MOV	DS,DX			    ;AN000;LB. DS:SI-> SC sector addr
 30863                                  	MOV	SI,AX			    ;AN000;LB.
 30864                                  	MOV	ES,[ss:CALLXAD+2]		    ;AN000;LB. ES:DI-> buffer addr
 30865                                  	MOV	DI,[ss:CALLXAD]		    ;AN000;LB.
 30866                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30867                                  	;MOV	CX,[ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]	    ;AN000;LB. count= sector size
 30868                                  	SHR	CX,1			    ;AN000;LB. may use DWORD move for 386
 30869                                  ;entry MOVWORDS
 30870                                  MOVWORDS:				    ;AN000;
 30871                                  	CMP	byte [ss:DDMOVE],0	    ;AN000;LB. 386 ?
 30872                                  	JZ	short nodd		    ;AN000;LB. no
 30873                                  	SHR	CX,1			    ;AN000;LB. words/2
 30874                                  	DB	66H			    ;AN000;LB. use double word move
 30875                                  nodd:
 30876                                  	REP	MOVSW			    ;AN000;LB. move to buffer
 30877                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;LB. clear carry
 30878                                  	retn				    ;AN000;LB. exit
 30879                                  noSC:					    ;AN000;
 30880                                  	STC				    ;AN000;LB. set carry
 30881                                  sexit:					    ;AN000;
 30882                                  	retn				    ;AN000;LB.
 30883                                  
 30884                                  %endif	; SC
