 30893                                  ;	TITLE	MKNODE - Node maker
 30894                                  ;	NAME	MKNODE
 30895                                  
 30896                                  ;**	MKNODE.ASM
 30897                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30898                                  ;	Low level routines for making a new local file system node
 30899                                  ;	and filling in an SFT from a directory entry
 30900                                  ;
 30901                                  ;	BUILDDIR
 30902                                  ;	SETDOTENT
 30903                                  ;	MakeNode
 30904                                  ;	NEWENTRY
 30905                                  ;	FREEENT
 30906                                  ;	NEWDIR
 30907                                  ;	DOOPEN
 30908                                  ;	RENAME_MAKE
 30909                                  ;	CHECK_VIRT_OPEN
 30910                                  ;
 30911                                  ;	Revision history:
 30912                                  ;
 30913                                  ;	 AN000	version 4.0  Jan. 1988
 30914                                  ;	 A004	PTM 3680  --- Make SFT NAME field offset same as 3.30
 30915                                  
 30916                                  ;Break   <BUILDDIR,NEWDIR -- ALLOCATE DIRECTORIES>
 30917                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30918                                  ;
 30919                                  ; Procedure Name : BUILDDIR,NEWDIR
 30920                                  ;
 30921                                  ; Inputs:
 30922                                  ;       ES:BP Points to DPB
 30923                                  ;       [THISSFT] Set if using NEWDIR entry point
 30924                                  ;               (used by ALLOCATE)
 30925                                  ;       [LASTENT] current last valid entry number in directory if no free
 30926                                  ;               entries
 30927                                  ;       [DIRSTART] Points to first cluster of dir (0 means root)
 30928                                  ; Function:
 30929                                  ;       Grow directory if no free entries and not root
 30930                                  ; Outputs:
 30931                                  ;       CARRY SET IF FAILURE
 30932                                  ;       ELSE
 30933                                  ;          AX entry number of new entry
 30934                                  ;          If a new dir [DIRSTART],[CLUSFAC],[CLUSNUM],[DIRSEC] set
 30935                                  ;               AX = first entry of new dir
 30936                                  ;       GETENT should be called to set [LASTENT]
 30937                                  ;
 30938                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30939                                  
 30940                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30941                                  ; DOSCODE:8845h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 30942                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 30943                                  ; DOSCODE:880Ah (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 30944                                  
 30945                                  ; 24/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 MSDOS.SYS)
 30946                                  ; DOSCODE:8845h (MSDOS 6.22, MSDOS.SYS)
 30947                                  
 30948                                  ; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 30949                                  ; DOSCODE:940Ah (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 30950                                  
 30951                                  ; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:890Ch)
 30952                                  
 30953                                  BUILDDIR:
 30954                                  	; 29/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 30955                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset 4E66h
 30956                                  
 30957 00005001 A1[D805]                	MOV	AX,[ENTFREE]
 30958 00005004 83F8FF                  	CMP	AX,-1 ; 0FFFFh
 30959                                  	;JZ	short CHECK_IF_ROOT
 30960                                  	;CLC
 30961                                  	;retn
 30962                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30963 00005007 750E                    	jne	short builddir_cmc_retn  ; cf=1 (will be 0)
 30964                                  
 30965                                  CHECK_IF_ROOT:
 30966                                  	; 23/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 30967                                  	;;;
 30968 00005009 833E[DC0A]00            	cmp	word [DIRSTART_HW],0
 30969 0000500E 7509                    	jnz	short NEWDIR 
 30970                                  	;;;
 30971 00005010 833E[C205]00            	CMP	word [DIRSTART],0
 30972 00005015 7502                    	JNZ	short NEWDIR
 30973                                  	;STC				; Can't grow root
 30974                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30975                                  	; [DIRSTART]=0, cf=0, zf=1 (cf will be 1 after cmc instruction)
 30976                                  builddir_cmc_retn:
 30977                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30978 00005017 F5                      	cmc	; cf=1 <-> cf=0
 30979                                  builddir_retn:
 30980 00005018 C3                      	retn
 30981                                  
 30982                                  	;entry   NEWDIR
 30983                                  NEWDIR: 
 30984                                  	; 23/02/2024
 30985                                  	;;;
 30986 00005019 8B1E[DC0A]              	mov	bx,[DIRSTART_HW]
 30987 0000501D 891E[E80A]              	mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],bx
 30988 00005021 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 30989                                  	;;;
 30990 00005023 8B1E[C205]              	MOV	BX,[DIRSTART]
 30991                                  	;;;
 30992 00005027 7504                    	jnz	short NEWDIR2 ; 23/02/2024
 30993                                  	;;;
 30994 00005029 09DB                    	OR	BX,BX
 30995 0000502B 7405                    	JZ	short NULLDIR
 30996                                  NEWDIR2:
 30997 0000502D E87A08                  	call	GETEOF
 30998 00005030 72E6                    	jc	short builddir_retn	; Screw up
 30999                                  NULLDIR:
 31000                                  	;MOV	CX,1
 31001                                  	; 23/02/2024
 31002                                  	;;;
 31003 00005032 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 31004 00005034 890E[F00A]              	mov	[CCOUNT_HW],cx ; 0
 31005 00005038 41                      	inc	cx ; 1
 31006                                  	;;;
 31007 00005039 E81606                  	call	ALLOCATE
 31008 0000503C 72DA                    	jc	short builddir_retn
 31009 0000503E 8B16[C205]              	MOV	DX,[DIRSTART]
 31010                                  	; 23/02/2024
 31011                                  	;;;
 31012 00005042 3B16[DC0A]              	cmp	dx,[DIRSTART_HW]
 31013 00005046 7519                    	jnz	short ADDINGDIR
 31014                                  	;;;
 31015 00005048 09D2                    	OR	DX,DX
 31016 0000504A 7515                    	JNZ	short ADDINGDIR
 31017                                  	; 23/02/2024
 31018                                  	;;;
 31019 0000504C FF36[E80A]              	push	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 31020 00005050 8F06[EE0A]              	pop	word [ROOTCLUST_HW]
 31021                                  	;;;
 31022 00005054 E889F7                  	call	SETDIRSRCH
 31023 00005057 72BF                    	jc	short builddir_retn
 31024 00005059 C706[4803]FFFF          	MOV	word [LASTENT],-1
 31025 0000505F EB2E                    	JMP	SHORT GOTDIRREC
 31026                                  ADDINGDIR:
 31027 00005061 53                      	PUSH    BX
 31028                                  	; 23/02/2024
 31029                                  	;;;
 31030 00005062 FF36[E80A]              	push	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 31031                                  	;
 31032 00005066 8B1E[DE0A]              	mov	bx,[CLUSNUM_HW]
 31033 0000506A 891E[E80A]              	mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],bx
 31034                                  	;;;
 31035 0000506E 8B1E[BC05]              	MOV	BX,[CLUSNUM]
 31036 00005072 E8B20E                  	call	IsEOF
 31037                                  	;;;
 31038 00005075 8F06[E80A]              	pop	word [CLUSTNUM_HW] ; 23/02/2024
 31039                                  	;;;
 31040 00005079 5B                      	POP	BX
 31041 0000507A 720C                    	JB	short NOTFIRSTGROW
 31042                                  ;;;; 10/17/86 update CLUSNUM in the fastopen cache
 31043 0000507C 891E[BC05]              	MOV	[CLUSNUM],BX
 31044                                  
 31045                                  ; 03/03/2025 (MiniDOS)
 31046                                  %if 0
 31047                                  
 31048                                  	; 24/09/2023
 31049                                  	;PUSH	CX ; (not necessary)
 31050                                  	PUSH	AX
 31051                                  	PUSH	BP
 31052                                  	; 23/02/2024
 31053                                  	;;;
 31054                                  	mov	ax,[CLUSTNUM_HW]
 31055                                  	mov	[CLUSNUM_HW],ax
 31056                                  	;;;
 31057                                  	MOV	AH,1			; CLUSNUM update
 31058                                  	; 15/12/2022
 31059                                  	mov	dl,[ES:BP] ; 09/09/2018
 31060                                  	; 22/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 31061                                  	;;mov	dl,[es:bp+0]
 31062                                  	;MOV	DL,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE]	; drive #
 31063                                  	MOV	CX,[DIRSTART]		; first cluster #
 31064                                  	MOV	BP,BX 			; CLUSNUM
 31065                                  	call	FastOpen_Update
 31066                                  	POP	BP
 31067                                  	POP	AX
 31068                                  	; 24/09/2023
 31069                                  	;POP	CX
 31070                                  
 31071                                  %endif
 31072                                  	; 03/03/2025 (MiniDOS)
 31073 00005080 8B16[E80A]              	mov	dx,[CLUSTNUM_HW]
 31074 00005084 8916[DE0A]              	mov	[CLUSNUM_HW],dx
 31075                                  
 31076                                  ;;;; 10/17/86 update CLUSNUM in the fastopen cache
 31077                                  NOTFIRSTGROW:
 31078 00005088 89DA                    	MOV	DX,BX
 31079 0000508A 30DB                    	XOR	BL,BL
 31080 0000508C E88805                  	call	FIGREC
 31081                                  GOTDIRREC:
 31082                                  	;mov	cl,[es:bp+4]
 31083 0000508F 268A4E04                	MOV	CL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK]
 31084                                  	;INC	CL
 31085                                  	; 27/06/2024
 31086 00005093 41                      	inc	cx
 31087 00005094 30ED                    	XOR	CH,CH
 31088                                  ZERODIR:
 31089 00005096 51                      	PUSH    CX
 31090                                  	; 22/09/2023
 31091                                  	;;mov	byte [ALLOWED],18h
 31092                                  	;MOV	byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_FAIL+Allowed_RETRY ; *
 31093 00005097 B0FF                    	MOV	AL,0FFH
 31094                                  	;call	GETBUFFR
 31095 00005099 E8FE14                  	call	GETBUFFRD ; *
 31096 0000509C 7302                    	JNC	short GET_SSIZE
 31097 0000509E 59                      	POP	CX
 31098 0000509F C3                      	retn
 31099                                  
 31100                                  GET_SSIZE:
 31101                                  	;mov	cx,[es:bp+2]
 31102 000050A0 268B4E02                	MOV	CX,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE]
 31103 000050A4 06                      	PUSH    ES
 31104 000050A5 C43E[E205]              	LES	DI,[CURBUF]
 31105                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],4
 31106 000050A9 26804D0504              	OR	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_isDIR
 31107 000050AE 57                      	PUSH    DI
 31108                                  	;;;add	di,16	; MSDOS 3.3
 31109                                  	;;add	di,20	; MSDOS 6.0	
 31110                                  	;add	di,24	; PCDOS 7.1 ; 23/02/2024
 31111 000050AF 83C718                  	ADD	DI,BUFINSIZ
 31112 000050B2 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX
 31113 000050B4 D1E9                    	SHR	CX,1
 31114 000050B6 F3AB                    	REP	STOSW
 31115 000050B8 7301                    	JNC	short EVENZ
 31116 000050BA AA                      	STOSB
 31117                                  EVENZ:
 31118 000050BB 5F                      	POP	DI
 31119                                  
 31120                                  ; 23/02/2024
 31121                                  %if 0
 31122                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 31123                                  	TEST	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 31124                                  					;LB. if already dirty		  ;AN000;
 31125                                  	JNZ	short yesdirty7		;LB.  don't increment dirty count ;AN000;
 31126                                  	call	INC_DIRTY_COUNT		;LB. 				  ;AN000;
 31127                                  	
 31128                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],40h
 31129                                  	OR	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 31130                                  %else
 31131                                  	; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 31132 000050BC E86E17                  	call	SET_BUF_DIRTY
 31133                                  %endif
 31134                                  
 31135                                  yesdirty7:
 31136 000050BF 07                      	POP	ES
 31137 000050C0 59                      	POP	CX
 31138                                  
 31139                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31140                                  
 31141                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 31142                                  	;INC	DX
 31143                                  
 31144                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 31145                                  	; 24/09/2023
 31146                                  	;add	dx,1
 31147                                  	;;adc	word [HIGH_SECTOR],0
 31148                                  	;; 24/09/2023
 31149                                  	;; ax=0
 31150                                  	;adc	[HIGH_SECTOR],ax ; 0
 31151                                  	; 24/09/2023
 31152 000050C1 42                      	inc	dx
 31153 000050C2 7504                    	jnz	short loop_zerodir
 31154 000050C4 FF06[0706]              	inc	word [HIGH_SECTOR]
 31155                                  loop_zerodir:
 31156 000050C8 E2CC                    	LOOP	ZERODIR
 31157                                  
 31158 000050CA A1[4803]                	MOV	AX,[LASTENT]
 31159 000050CD 40                      	INC	AX
 31160                                  	; 24/09/2023
 31161                                  	; cf=0
 31162                                  	;CLC
 31163 000050CE C3                      	retn
 31164                                  
 31165                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31166                                  ;
 31167                                  ; Procedure Name : SETDOTENT
 31168                                  ;
 31169                                  ; set up a . or .. directory entry for a directory.
 31170                                  ;
 31171                                  ;   Inputs:     ES:DI point to the beginning of a directory entry.
 31172                                  ;               AX contains ". " or ".."
 31173                                  ;               DX contains first cluster of entry
 31174                                  ;
 31175                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31176                                  
 31177                                  	; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 31178                                  
 31179                                  SETDOTENT:
 31180                                  ;	Fill in name field
 31181 000050CF AB                      	STOSW
 31182 000050D0 B90400                  	MOV	CX,4
 31183 000050D3 B82020                  	MOV	AX,"  " ; 2020h
 31184 000050D6 F3AB                    	REP	STOSW
 31185 000050D8 AA                      	STOSB
 31186                                  
 31187                                  ;	Set up attribute
 31188                                  	;mov	al, 10h
 31189 000050D9 B010                    	MOV	AL,attr_directory
 31190 000050DB AA                      	STOSB
 31191                                  
 31192                                  ;	Initialize time and date of creation
 31193                                  	;ADD	DI,10
 31194                                  	; 23/04/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 31195                                  	;;;
 31196 000050DC 83C708                  	add	di,8
 31197 000050DF A1[F20A]                	mov	ax,[CLUSTERS_HW]
 31198 000050E2 AB                      	stosw		; Set up first cluster field (hw)
 31199                                  	;;;	
 31200 000050E3 8B36[9E05]              	MOV	SI,[THISSFT]
 31201                                  	;mov	ax,[si+0Dh]
 31202 000050E7 8B440D                  	MOV	AX,[SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_time]
 31203 000050EA AB                      	STOSW
 31204                                  	;mov	ax,[si+0Fh]
 31205 000050EB 8B440F                  	MOV	AX,[SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_date]
 31206 000050EE AB                      	STOSW
 31207                                  
 31208                                  ;	Set up first cluster field (lw)
 31209 000050EF 89D0                    	MOV	AX,DX
 31210 000050F1 AB                      	STOSW
 31211                                  
 31212                                  ;	0 file size
 31213                                  	;XOR	AX,AX
 31214 000050F2 91                      	xchg	ax,cx ; 23/02/2024
 31215 000050F3 AB                      	STOSW
 31216 000050F4 AB                      	STOSW
 31217 000050F5 C3                      	retn
 31218                                  
 31219                                  ;Break   <MAKENODE -- CREATE A NEW NODE>
 31220                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31221                                  ;
 31222                                  ; Procedure Name : MakeNode
 31223                                  ;
 31224                                  ; Inputs:
 31225                                  ;       AL - attribute to create
 31226                                  ;       AH = 0 if it is ok to truncate a file already by this name
 31227                                  ;	AH != 0 if truncation not allowed (prexisting file is an error)
 31228                                  ;               (AH ignored on dirs and devices)
 31229                                  ;
 31230                                  ;        NOTE: When making a DIR or volume ID, AH need not be set since
 31231                                  ;               a name already existant is ALWAYS an error in these cases.
 31232                                  ;
 31233                                  ;       [WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 31234                                  ;               terminated)
 31235                                  ;       [CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 31236                                  ;               ( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 31237                                  ;                Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 31238                                  ;       [THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 31239                                  ;       [THISSFT] Points to an empty SFT. EXCEPT sf_mode filled in.
 31240                                  ; Function:
 31241                                  ;       Make a new node
 31242                                  ; Outputs:
 31243                                  ;       Sets EXTERR_LOCUS = errLOC_Disk or errLOC_Unk via GetPathNoset
 31244                                  ;       CARRY SET IF ERROR
 31245                                  ;          AX = 1 A node by this name exists and is a directory
 31246                                  ;          AX = 2 A new node could not be created
 31247                                  ;          AX = 3 A node by this name exists and is a disk file
 31248                                  ;               (AH was NZ on input)
 31249                                  ;          AX = 4 Bad Path
 31250                                  ;               SI return from GetPath maintained
 31251                                  ;          AX = 5 Attribute mismatch
 31252                                  ;          AX = 6 Sharing Violation
 31253                                  ;               (INT 24 generated ALWAYS since create is always compat mode
 31254                                  ;          AX = 7 file not found for Extended Open (not exists and fails)
 31255                                  ;       ELSE
 31256                                  ;          AX = 0 Disk Node
 31257                                  ;          AX = 3 Device Node (error in some cases)
 31258                                  ;          [DIRSTART],[DIRSEC],[CLUSFAC],[CLUSNUM] set to directory
 31259                                  ;               containing new node.
 31260                                  ;          [CURBUF+2]:BX Points to entry
 31261                                  ;          [CURBUF+2]:SI Points to entry.dir_first
 31262                                  ;          [THISSFT] is filled in
 31263                                  ;               sf_mode = unchanged.
 31264                                  ;          Attribute byte in entry is input AL
 31265                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 31266                                  ;
 31267                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31268                                  
 31269                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31270                                  ; DOSCODE:8925h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 31271                                  
 31272                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31273                                  ; DOSCODE:88EAh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31274                                  
 31275                                  ; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 31276                                  ; DOSCODE:951Ah (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 31277                                  
 31278                                  MakeNode:
 31279                                  	;mov	word [CREATING],0E5FFh
 31280 000050F6 C706[7E05]FFE5          	MOV	WORD [CREATING],DIRFREE*256 + 0FFh ; Creating, not DEL *.*
 31281 000050FC 50                      	PUSH	AX 		; Save AH value
 31282 000050FD C606[4C03]00            	MOV	byte [NoSetDir],0
 31283 00005102 A2[6D05]                	MOV	[SATTRIB],AL
 31284 00005105 E88BF8                  	call	GetPathNoSet
 31285 00005108 88CA                    	MOV	DL,CL		; Save CL info
 31286                                  	;MOV	CX,AX		; Device ID to CH
 31287                                  	; 23/02/2024
 31288 0000510A 91                      	xchg	ax,cx
 31289 0000510B 58                      	POP	AX		; Get back AH
 31290 0000510C 732D                    	JNC	short make_exists ; File existed
 31291 0000510E 7505                    	JNZ	short make_err_4 ; Path bad
 31292 00005110 80FA80                  	CMP	DL,80h		; Check "CL" return from GETPATH
 31293 00005113 7405                    	JZ	short make_type	; Name simply not found, and no metas
 31294                                  make_err_4:
 31295 00005115 B004                    	MOV	AL,4		; case 1 bad path
 31296                                  make_err_ret:
 31297                                  	;XOR	AH,AH
 31298                                  	; 23/02/2024
 31299 00005117 98                      	cbw
 31300 00005118 F9                      	STC
 31301                                  ;make_retn:	; 22/11/2022
 31302 00005119 C3                      	retn
 31303                                  
 31304                                  	;entry	RENAME_MAKE	; Used by DOS_RENAME to "copy" a node
 31305                                  RENAME_MAKE:
 31306                                  make_type:
 31307                                  ;Extended Open hooks
 31308                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 31309                                  	;TESTB	EXTOPEN_ON,EXT_OPEN_ON	;FT. from extended open		;AN000;
 31310 0000511A F606[F605]01            	test	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_OPEN_ON ; 1
 31311 0000511F 7411                    	JZ	short make_type2	;FT. no				;AN000;
 31312 00005121 800E[F605]04            	OR	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_FILE_NOT_EXISTS ; 4
 31313                                  					;FT. set for extended open ;AN000;
 31314                                  	;TESTB	EXTOPEN_FLAG,0F0H	;FT. not exists and fails	;AN000;
 31315 00005126 F606[F405]F0            	test	byte [EXTOPEN_FLAG],0F0h
 31316 0000512B 7505                    	JNZ	short make_type2	;FT. no				;AN000;
 31317 0000512D F9                      	STC				;FT. set carry			;AN000;
 31318 0000512E B80700                  	MOV    AX,7			;FT. file not found		;AN000;
 31319                                  	; 22/11/2022
 31320                                  make_retn:
 31321                                  	;return
 31322 00005131 C3                      	retn				;FT.				;AN000;
 31323                                  
 31324                                  ;	Extended Open hooks
 31325                                  
 31326                                  make_type2:
 31327 00005132 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 31328 00005136 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX		; nothing exists Disk Node
 31329 00005138 F9                      	STC			; Not found
 31330 00005139 EB59                    	JMP	short make_new
 31331                                  
 31332                                  ; The node exists. It may be either a device, directory or file:
 31333                                  ;   Zero set => directory
 31334                                  ;   High bit of CH on => device
 31335                                  ;   else => file
 31336                                  
 31337                                  make_exists:
 31338 0000513B 7447                    	JZ	short make_exists_dir
 31339 0000513D B003                    	MOV	AL,3		; file exists type 3  (error or device node)
 31340                                  	;test	byte [ATTRIB],18h
 31341 0000513F F606[6B05]18            	TEST	byte [ATTRIB],attr_volume_id+attr_directory
 31342 00005144 753A                    	JNZ	short make_err_ret_5
 31343                                  				; Cannot already exist as Disk or Device Node
 31344                                  				;  if making DIR or Volume ID
 31345 00005146 08ED                    	OR	CH,CH
 31346 00005148 781A                    	JS	short make_share ; No further checks on attributes if device
 31347 0000514A 08E4                    	OR	AH,AH
 31348 0000514C 75C9                    	JNZ	short make_err_ret ; truncating NOT OK (AL = 3)
 31349 0000514E 51                      	PUSH	CX		; Save device ID
 31350 0000514F 8E06[E405]              	MOV	ES,[CURBUF+2]
 31351                                  	;mov	ch,[es:bx+0Bh]
 31352 00005153 268A6F0B                	MOV	CH,[ES:BX+dir_entry.dir_attr] ; Get file attributes
 31353                                  	;test	ch,1
 31354 00005157 F6C501                  	test	CH,attr_read_only
 31355 0000515A 7523                    	JNZ	short make_err_ret_5P ; Cannot create on read only files
 31356 0000515C E858FA                  	call	MatchAttributes
 31357 0000515F 59                      	POP	CX		; Devid back in CH
 31358 00005160 751E                    	JNZ	short make_err_ret_5 ; Attributes not ok
 31359 00005162 30C0                    	XOR	AL,AL		; AL = 0, Disk Node
 31360                                  make_share:
 31361                                  	;XOR	AH,AH
 31362                                  	; 23/02/2024
 31363 00005164 98                      	cbw
 31364 00005165 50                      	PUSH	AX		; Save Disk or Device node
 31365 00005166 51                      	PUSH	CX		; Save Device ID
 31366 00005167 88EC                    	MOV	AH,CH		; Device ID to AH
 31367 00005169 E83201                  	CALL	DOOPEN		; Fill in SFT for share check
 31368 0000516C C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 31369 00005170 56                      	push	si
 31370 00005171 53                      	push	bx		; Save CURBUF pointers
 31371 00005172 E8622F                  	call	ShareEnter
 31372 00005175 734E                    	jnc	short MakeEndShare
 31373                                  
 31374                                  ; User failed request.
 31375 00005177 5B                      	pop	bx
 31376 00005178 5E                      	pop	si
 31377 00005179 59                      	pop	cx

 31396                                  make_save:

 31405                                  
 31406                                  make_new:

 31409                                  	;test	byte [ATTRIB],10h

 31411 0000519E 75F3                    	jnz	short make_save_retn	; Don't "open" directories,
 31412                                  					; so don't tell the sharer about them

 31414 000051A1 53                      	push	bx
 31415 000051A2 56                      	push	si

 31419 000051A8 58                      	pop	ax
 31420 000051A9 73E8                    	jnc	short make_save_retn
 31421                                  
 31422                                  ; We get here by having the user FAIL a share problem. Typically a failure of
 31423                                  ; this nature is an out-of-space or an internal error. We clean up as best as
 31424                                  ; possible: delete the newly created directory entry and return share_error.
 31425                                  
 31426 000051AB 50                      	PUSH	AX
 31427 000051AC C43E[E205]              	LES	DI,[CURBUF]

 31430                                  
 31431                                  ; 23/02/2024

 31434                                  	;test	byte [es:di+5],40h

 31436                                  					;LB. if already dirty		  ;AN000;

 31440                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],40h
 31441                                  	OR	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty ; flag buffer as dirty
 31442                                  yesdirty8:
 31443                                  %else

 31445 000051B4 E87616                  	call	SET_BUF_DIRTY
 31446                                  %endif
 31447 000051B7 C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]
 31448                                  	; 15/12/2022
 31449 000051BB 268A4600                	mov	al,[ES:BP]
 31450                                  	; 22/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 31451                                  	;;mov	al,[es:bp+0]
 31452                                  	;MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE]	; get drive for flush
 31453 000051BF E84515                  	call	FLUSHBUF		; write out buffer.
 31454 000051C2 58                      	POP	AX
 31455 000051C3 EBB6                    	jmp	short Make_Share_ret
 31456                                  
 31457                                  ; We have found an existing file. We have also entered it into the share set.
 31458                                  ; At this point we need to call newentry to correctly address the problem of
 31459                                  ; getting rid of old data (create an existing file) or creating a new
 31460                                  ; directory entry (create a new file). Unfortunately, this operation may
 31461                                  ; result in an INT 24 that the user doesn't return from, thus locking the file
 31462                                  ; irretrievably into the share set. The correct solution is for us to LEAVE
 31463                                  ; the share set now, do the operation and then reassert the share access.
 31464                                  ;
 31465                                  ; We are allowed to do this! There is no window! After all, we are in
 31466                                  ; critDisk here and for someone else to get in, they must enter critDisk also.
 31467                                  
 31468                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31469                                  	; DOSCODE:89C8h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31470                                  
 31471                                  MakeEndShare:
 31472 000051C5 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]		; grab SFT
 31473 000051C9 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX
 31474 000051CB E8CAC6                  	call	ECritSFT
 31475 000051CE 268705                  	xchg	AX,[ES:DI]
 31476                                  	;XCHG	AX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]
 31477 000051D1 50                      	push	ax
 31478 000051D2 57                      	push	di
 31479 000051D3 06                      	push	es
 31480 000051D4 9C                      	PUSHF
 31481 000051D5 E8FA2E                  	call	ShareEnd		; remove sharing
 31482 000051D8 9D                      	POPF
 31483 000051D9 07                      	pop	es
 31484 000051DA 5F                      	pop	di
 31485 000051DB 268F05                  	pop	word [ES:DI]
 31486                                  	;pop	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]
 31487 000051DE E8E4C6                  	call	LCritSFT
 31488                                  	; 22/11/2022
 31489                                  	; DOSCODE:89E4h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31490 000051E1 5B                      	pop	bx
 31491 000051E2 5E                      	pop	si
 31492 000051E3 59                      	pop	cx
 31493 000051E4 58                      	pop	ax
 31494 000051E5 E8A0FF                  	CALL	make_save
 31495                                  
 31496                                  ; If the user failed, we do not reenter into the sharing set.
 31497                                  
 31498 000051E8 72A9                    	jc	short make_save_retn	; bye if error
 31499 000051EA 50                      	push	ax
 31500 000051EB 53                      	push	bx
 31501 000051EC 56                      	push	si
 31502 000051ED 9C                      	PUSHF
 31503 000051EE E8E62E                  	call	ShareEnter
 31504 000051F1 9D                      	POPF
 31505 000051F2 5E                      	pop	si
 31506 000051F3 5B                      	pop	bx
 31507 000051F4 58                      	pop	ax
 31508                                  
 31509                                  ; If Share_check fails, then we have an internal ERROR!!!!!
 31510                                  
 31511                                  makeendshare_retn:
 31512 000051F5 C3                      	retn
 31513                                  
 31514                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31515                                  ;
 31516                                  ; Procedure Name : NEWENTRY
 31517                                  ;
 31518                                  ; Inputs:
 31519                                  ;	  [THISSFT] set
 31520                                  ;	  [THISDPB] set
 31521                                  ;	  [LASTENT] current last valid entry number in directory if no free
 31522                                  ;		  entries
 31523                                  ;	  [VOLID] set if a volume ID was found during search
 31524                                  ;	Attrib Contains attributes for new file
 31525                                  ;	  [DIRSTART] Points to first cluster of dir (0 means root)
 31526                                  ;	  CARRY FLAG INDICATES STATUS OF SEARCH FOR FILE
 31527                                  ;		  NC means file existed (device)
 31528                                  ;		  C  means file did not exist
 31529                                  ;	  AH = Device ID byte
 31530                                  ;	  If FILE
 31531                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:BX points to start of directory entry
 31532                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:SI points to dir_first of directory entry
 31533                                  ;	  If device
 31534                                  ;	  DS:BX points to start of "fake" directory entry
 31535                                  ;	  DS:SI points to dir_first of "fake" directory entry
 31536                                  ;		  (has DWORD pointer to device header)
 31537                                  ; Function:
 31538                                  ;	  Make a new directory entry
 31539                                  ;	  If an old one existed it is truncated first
 31540                                  ; Outputs:
 31541                                  ;	  Carry set if error
 31542                                  ;		  Can't grow dir, atts didn't match, attempt to make 2nd
 31543                                  ;		  vol ID, user FAILed to I 24
 31544                                  ;	  else
 31545                                  ;		  outputs of DOOPEN
 31546                                  ; DS, BX, SI preserved (meaning on SI BX, not value), others destroyed
 31547                                  ;
 31548                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31549                                  
 31550                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31551                                  	; DOSCODE:89F9h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31552                                  
 31553                                  	; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 31554                                  	; DOSCODE:961Ah (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 31555                                  
 31556                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8A34h)
 31557                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:8B7Dh)
 31558                                  
 31559                                  NEWENTRY:

 31591 00005229 75E4                    	JNZ	short ERRRET3	; Can't create a second volume ID
 31592                                  NOTVOLID:

 31594 0000522F 89DF                    	MOV	DI,BX
 31595

 31597

 31605 0000523E B105                    	MOV	CL,5		;FT. assume normal FBUGBUG	;AN000;
 31606                                  ;; File Tagging for Create DOS 4.00
 31607

 31629

 31700                                  
 31701                                  ; DOOPEN
 31702                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31703                                  ;
 31704                                  ; Inputs:
 31705                                  ;	  [THISDPB] points to DPB if file
 31706                                  ;	  [THISSFT] points to SFT being used
 31707                                  ;	  AH = Device ID byte
 31708                                  ;	  If FILE
 31709                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:BX points to start of directory entry
 31710                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:SI points to dir_first of directory entry
 31711                                  ;	  If device
 31712                                  ;	  DS:BX points to start of "fake" directory entry
 31713                                  ;	  DS:SI points to dir_first of "fake" directory entry
 31714                                  ;		  (has DWORD pointer to device header)
 31715                                  ; Function:
 31716                                  ;	  Fill in SFT from dir entry
 31717                                  ; Outputs:
 31718                                  ;	  CARRY CLEAR
 31719                                  ;	  sf_ref_count and sf_mode fields not altered
 31720                                  ;	  sf_flags high byte = 0
 31721                                  ;	  sf_flags low byte = AH except
 31722                                  ;	  sf_flags Bit 6 set (not dirty or not EOF)
 31723                                  ;	  sf_attr sf_date sf_time sf_name set from entry
 31724                                  ;	  sf_position = 0
 31725                                  ;	  If device
 31726                                  ;	  sf_devptr = dword at dir_first (pointer to device header)
 31727                                  ;	  sf_size = 0
 31728                                  ;	  If file
 31729                                  ;	  sf_firclus sf_size set from entry
 31730                                  ;	  sf_devptr = [THISDPB]
 31731                                  ;	  sf_cluspos = 0
 31732                                  ;	  sf_lstclus = sf_firclus
 31733                                  ;	  sf_dirsec sf_dirpos set
 31734                                  ; DS,SI,BX preserved, others destroyed
 31735                                  ;
 31736                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31737                                  
 31738                                  	; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 31739                                  	; DOSCODE:96C3h (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 31740                                  
 31741                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8AE4h)
 31742                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:8C4Ch)
 31743                                  
 31744                                  	;entry	DOOPEN
 31745                                  DOOPEN:
 31746                                  ;	Generate and store attribute
 31747

 32004                                  ; Procedure Name : FREEENT
 32005                                  ;
 32006                                  ; Inputs:
 32007                                  ;	  ES:BP -> DPB
 32008                                  ;	  [CURBUF] Set
 32009                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:BX points to directory entry
 32010                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:SI points to above dir_first
 32011                                  ; Function:
 32012                                  ;	  Free the cluster chain for the entry if present
 32013                                  ; Outputs:
 32014                                  ;	  Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 32015                                  ;	  (NOTE dir_firclus and dir_size_l/h are wrong)
 32016                                  ; DS BX SI ES BP preserved (BX,SI in meaning, not value) others destroyed
 32017                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32018                                  
 32019                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)

 32113                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32114                                  ;
 32115                                  ; Procedure Name : CHECK_VIRT_OPEN
 32116                                  ;
 32117                                  ; CHECK_VIRT_OPEN checks to see if we had performed a "virtual open" (by
 32118                                  ; examining the flag [VIRTUAL_OPEN] to see if it is 1). If we did, then
 32119                                  ; it calls Dev_Close_SFT to decrement the ref. count. It also resets the
 32120                                  ; flag [VIRTUAL_OPEN].
 32121                                  ; No registers affected (including flags).
 32122                                  ; On input, [THISSFT] points to current SFT.
 32123                                  ;
 32124                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32125                                  
 32126                                  CHECK_VIRT_OPEN:
 32127                                  	PUSH	AX
 32128                                  	lahf			; preserve flags
 32129                                  	CMP	byte [VIRTUAL_OPEN],0
 32130                                  	JZ	short ALL_CLOSED
 32131                                  	mov	byte [VIRTUAL_OPEN],0 ; reset flag
 32132                                  	push	es
 32133                                  	push	di
 32134                                  	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 32135                                  	call	DEV_CLOSE_SFT
 32136                                  	pop	di
 32137                                  	pop	es
 32138                                  
 32139                                  ALL_CLOSED:
 32140                                  	sahf			; restore flags
 32141                                  	POP	AX
 32142                                  	retn
 32143                                  
 32144                                  %endif

 32179                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32180                                  ;
 32181                                  ; Procedure Name : FNDCLUS
 32182                                  ;
 32183                                  ; Inputs:
 32184                                  ;       CX = No. of clusters to skip

 32186                                  ;       [THISSFT] point to SFT

 32189                                  ;       CX = No. of clusters remaining (0 unless EOF)

 32331 00005421 FF36[E80A]              	push	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]

 32398                                  ;Break  <BUFSEC -- BUFFER A SECTOR AND SET UP A TRANSFER>
 32399                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32400                                  ;
 32401                                  ; Procedure Name : BUFSEC
 32402                                  ;
 32403                                  ; Inputs:
 32404                                  ;       AH = priority of buffer
 32405                                  ;       AL = 0 if buffer must be read, 1 if no pre-read needed
 32406                                  ;       ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 32407                                  ;       [CLUSNUM] = Physical cluster number
 32408                                  ;       [SECCLUSPOS] = Sector position of transfer within cluster
 32409                                  ;       [BYTCNT1] = Size of transfer
 32410                                  ; Function:
 32411                                  ;       Insure specified sector is in buffer, flushing buffer before
 32412                                  ;       read if necessary.
 32413                                  ; Outputs:
 32414                                  ;       ES:DI = Pointer to buffer
 32415                                  ;       SI = Pointer to transfer address
 32416                                  ;       CX = Number of bytes
 32417                                  ;       [NEXTADD] updated
 32418                                  ;       [TRANS] set to indicate a transfer will occur
 32419                                  ;       Carry set if error (user FAILed to I 24)
 32420                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32421                                  
 32422                                  	; 25/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 32423                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:98C2h
 32424                                  
 32425                                  	; (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8BF1h) - Retro DOS v4.0 (& v4.1)
 32426                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8C2Ch) - Retro DOS v4.2
 32427                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:0BE33h)
 32428                                  
 32429                                  BUFSEC:
 32430                                  	; 25/02/2024
 32431                                  	;;;
 32432                                  	;push	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 32433 00005464 8B16[DE0A]              	mov	dx,[CLUSNUM_HW]
 32434                                  	;mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],dx
 32435 00005468 8716[E80A]              	xchg	dx,[CLUSTNUM_HW]
 32436 0000546C 52                      	push	dx	; [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 32437                                  	;;;
 32438 0000546D 8B16[BC05]                      MOV     DX,[CLUSNUM]
 32439 00005471 8A1E[7305]                      MOV     BL,[SECCLUSPOS]
 32440                                  	;mov	byte [ALLOWED],38h
 32441 00005475 C606[4B03]38                    MOV     byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_FAIL+Allowed_RETRY+Allowed_IGNORE
 32442 0000547A E89A01                          CALL    FIGREC
 32443 0000547D E81F11                  	call	GETBUFFR
 32444                                  	; 25/02/2024
 32445                                  	;;;
 32446 00005480 8F06[E80A]              	pop	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 32447                                  	;;;
 32448 00005484 72DD                            jc	short fndclus_retn
 32449                                  
 32450 00005486 C606[7405]01                    MOV     BYTE [TRANS],1	; A transfer is taking place
 32451 0000548B 8B36[B805]                      MOV     SI,[NEXTADD]
 32452 0000548F 89F7                            MOV     DI,SI
 32453 00005491 8B0E[D205]                      MOV     CX,[BYTCNT1]
 32454 00005495 01CF                            ADD     DI,CX
 32455 00005497 893E[B805]                      MOV     [NEXTADD],DI
 32456 0000549B C43E[E205]                      LES     DI,[CURBUF]
 32457                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],8
 32458 0000549F 26804D0508                      OR      byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_isDATA
 32459                                  	;;;lea	di,[di+16] ; MSDOS 3.3 
 32460                                  	;;lea	di,[di+20] ; MSDOS 6.0
 32461                                          ;lea	di,[di+24] ; PCDOS 7.1  ; 25/02/2024
 32462 000054A4 8D7D18                  	LEA     DI,[DI+BUFINSIZ]        ; Point to buffer
 32463 000054A7 033E[CC05]                      ADD     DI,[BYTSECPOS]
 32464 000054AB F8                              CLC	; (not necessary!?) ; 25/02/2024
 32465 000054AC C3                              retn
 32466                                  
 32467                                  ;Break   <BUFRD, BUFWRT -- PERFORM BUFFERED READ AND WRITE>
 32468                                  
 32469                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32470                                  ;
 32471                                  ; Procedure Name : BUFRD
 32472                                  ;
 32473                                  ; Do a partial sector read via one of the system buffers
 32474                                  ; ES:BP Points to DPB
 32475                                  ; Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 32476                                  ;
 32477                                  ; DS - set to DOSDATA
 32478                                  ;
 32479                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32480                                  
 32481                                  	; 25/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 32482                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 32483                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32484                                  BUFRD:
 32485 000054AD 06                              PUSH	ES
 32486 000054AE 31C0                            xor	ax,ax			; pre-read sector

 32538                                                                          ;  even though it is MRU.

 32541                                  ;M039					; chucking even though it is MRU.

 32743                                  ;Break	<OPTIMIZE -- DO A USER DISK REQUEST WELL>
 32744                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32745                                  ;
 32746                                  ; Procedure Name : OPTIMIZE
 32747                                  ;
 32748                                  ; Inputs:
 32749                                  ;	  BX = Physical cluster
 32750                                  ;	  CX = No. of records
 32751                                  ;	  DL = sector within cluster
 32752                                  ;	  ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 32753                                  ;	  [NEXTADD] = transfer address
 32754                                  ; Outputs:
 32755                                  ;	  AX = No. of records remaining
 32756                                  ;	  BX = Transfer address
 32757                                  ;	  CX = No. or records to be transferred
 32758                                  ;	  DX = Physical sector address (LOW)
 32759                                  ;	  [HIGH_SECTOR] = Physical sector address (HIGH)
 32760                                  ;	  DI = Next cluster
 32761                                  ;	  [CLUSNUM] = Last cluster accessed
 32762                                  ;	  [NEXTADD] updated
 32763                                  ;	  Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 32764                                  ; ES:BP unchanged. Note that segment of transfer not set.
 32765                                  ;
 32766                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32767                                  
 32768                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 32769                                  	; 27/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 32770                                  
 32771                                  OPTIMIZE:
 32772 00005588 52                      	PUSH	DX
 32773                                  	; 27/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 32774                                  	;;;
 32775 00005589 FF36[E80A]              	push	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 32776                                  	;;;
 32777 0000558D 53                      	PUSH	BX
 32778                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+4]
 32779 0000558E 268A4604                	MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK]
 32780 00005592 FEC0                    	INC	AL		; Number of sectors per cluster
 32781 00005594 88C4                    	MOV	AH,AL

 32783 00005598 89CA                    	MOV	DX,CX
 32784                                  	;MOV	CX,0
 32785                                  	; 25/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 32786                                  	; 16/12/2022
 32787 0000559A 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx	; sub cx,cx
 32788                                  OPTCLUS:
 32789                                  ; AL has number of sectors available in current cluster
 32790                                  ; AH has number of sectors available in next cluster
 32791                                  ; BX has current physical cluster
 32792                                  ; CX has number of sequential sectors found so far
 32793                                  ; DX has number of sectors left to transfer
 32794                                  ; ES:BP Points to DPB
 32795                                  ; ES:SI has FAT pointer
 32796

 32799 0000559F 7263                    	JC	short OP_ERR	; ds=ss ; 27/02/2024

 32915                                  
 32916                                  	; 10/06/2019

 33015                                  ; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33016                                  ; DOSCODE:8DC2h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 33017                                  
 33018                                  ; 30/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 33019                                  ; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset
 33020                                  
 33021                                  ;Break   <ALLOCATE -- Assign disk space>
 33022                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33023                                  ;
 33024                                  ; Procedure Name : ALLOCATE - Allocate Disk Space
 33025                                  ;
 33026                                  ;   ALLOCATE is called to allocate disk clusters. The new clusters are
 33027                                  ;   FAT-chained onto the end of the existing file.
 33028                                  ;
 33029                                  ;   The DPB contains the cluster # of the last free cluster allocated
 33030                                  ;   (dpb_next_free). We start at this cluster and scan towards higher
 33031                                  ;   numbered clusters, looking for the necessary free blocks.
 33032                                  ;
 33033                                  ;   Once again, fancy terminology gets in the way of correct coding. When
 33034                                  ;   using next_free, start scanning AT THAT POINT and not the one following it.
 33035                                  ;   This fixes the boundary condition bug when only free = next_free = 2.
 33036                                  ;
 33037                                  ;       If we get to the end of the disk without satisfaction:
 33038                                  ;
 33039                                  ;           if (dpb_next_free == 2) then we've scanned the whole disk.
 33040                                  ;               return (insufficient_disk_space)
 33041                                  ;           ELSE
 33042                                  ;               dpb_next_free = 2; start scan over from the beginning.
 33043                                  ;
 33044                                  ;   Note that there is no multitasking interlock. There is no race when
 33045                                  ;   examining the entrys in an in-core FAT block since there will be no
 33046                                  ;   context switch. When UNPACK context switches while waiting for a FAT read
 33047                                  ;   we are done with any in-core FAT blocks, so again there is no race. The
 33048                                  ;   only special concern is that V2 and V3 MSDOS left the last allocated
 33049                                  ;   cluster as "00"; marking it EOF only when the entire alloc request was
 33050                                  ;   satisfied. We can't allow another activation to think this cluster is
 33051                                  ;   free, so we give it a special temporary mark to show that it is, indeed,
 33052                                  ;   allocated.
 33053                                  ;
 33054                                  ;   Note that when we run out of space this algorithem will scan from
 33055                                  ;   dpb_next_free to the end, then scan from cluster 2 through the end,
 33056                                  ;   redundantly scanning the later part of the disk. This only happens when
 33057                                  ;   we run out of space, so sue me.
 33058                                  ;
 33059                                  ;----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----;
 33060                                  ;            C  A  V  E  A  T     P  A  T  T  E  R  S  O  N                ;
 33061                                  ;                                                                          ;
 33062                                  ;   The use of FATBYT and RESTFATBYT is somewhat mysterious. Here is the
 33063                                  ;   explanation:
 33064                                  ;
 33065                                  ;   In the NUL file case (sf_firclus currently 0) ALLOCATE is called with
 33066                                  ;   entry BX = 0. What needs to be done in this case is to stuff the cluster
 33067                                  ;   number of the first cluster allocated in sf_firclus when the ALLOCATE is
 33068                                  ;   complete. THIS VALUE IS SAVED TEMPORARILY IN CLUSTER 0, HENCE THE CURRENT
 33069                                  ;   VALUE IN CLUSTER 0 MUST BE SAVED AND RESTORED. This is a side effect of
 33070                                  ;   the fact that PACK and UNPACK don't treat requests for clusters 0 and 1 as
 33071                                  ;   errors. This "stuff" is done by the call to PACK which is right before
 33072                                  ;   the
 33073                                  ;           LOOP   findfre         ; alloc more if needed
 33074                                  ;   instruction when the first cluster is allocated to the nul file. The
 33075                                  ;   value is recalled from cluster 0 and stored at sf_firclus at ads4:
 33076                                  ;
 33077                                  ;   This method is obviously useless (because it is non-reentrant) for
 33078                                  ;   multitasking, and will have to be changed. Storing the required value on
 33079                                  ;   the stack is recommended. Setting sf_firclus at the PACK of cluster 0
 33080                                  ;   (instead of actually doing the PACK) is BAD because it doesn't handle
 33081                                  ;   problems with INT 24 well.
 33082                                  ;
 33083                                  ;            C  A  V  E  A  T     P  A  T  T  E  R  S  O  N                ;
 33084                                  ;----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----;
 33085                                  ;                                                                          ;
 33086                                  ;       ENTRY   BX = Last cluster of file (0 if null file)
 33087                                  ;               CX = No. of clusters to allocate
 33088                                  ;               ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 33089                                  ;               [THISSFT] = Points to SFT
 33090                                  ;
 33091                                  ;       EXIT   'C' set if insufficient space
 33092                                  ;                [FAILERR] can be tested to see the reason for failure
 33093                                  ;                CX = max. no. of clusters that could be added to file
 33094                                  ;              'C' clear if space allocated
 33095                                  ;                BX = First cluster allocated
 33096                                  ;                FAT is fully updated
 33097                                  ;                sf_FIRCLUS field of SFT set if file was null
 33098                                  ;
 33099                                  ;       USES    ALL but SI, BP
 33100                                  
 33101                                  ;callmagic  proc near
 33102                                  ;       push    ds                             ;push segment of routine 
 33103                                  ;       push    Offset MagicPatch              ;push offset for routine
 33104                                  ;       retf                                   ;simulate jmp far
 33105                                  ;                                              ;far return address is on
 33106                                  ;                                              ;stack, so far return from
 33107                                  ;                                              ;call will return this routine
 33108                                  ;callmagic  endp
 33109                                  
 33110                                  ; 27/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 33111                                  ;PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:9AC5h
 33112                                  
 33113                                  ; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8DC2h)
 33114                                  ; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:0C078h)
 33115                                  
 33116                                  ; 07/03/2025
 33117                                  ; 25/09/2023

 33119                                  callmagic:
 33120                                  	push	ds
 33121                                  	push	word [ss:OffsetMagicPatch]
 33122                                  	retf	
 33123                                  %endif

 33133                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:9ACFh
 33134                                  
 33135                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8DC9h)
 33136                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:0C07Fh)
 33137                                  
 33138                                  ALLOCATE:

 33147                                  ;data would not.

 33178                                  ;END MAGICDRV MODIFICATIONS

 33182

 33233 00005673 FF36[F00A]              	push	word [CCOUNT_HW]
 33234 00005677 51                      	push	cx

 33257                                  ads1:

 33259 000056A6 7721                    	ja	short FINDFRE
 33260                                  ads2:
 33261 000056A8 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx ; 0
 33262                                  	;cmp	[es:bp+0Fh],bx
 33263 000056AA 26395E0F                	cmp	[es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE],bx ; 0
 33264 000056AE 750A                    	jnz	short ads3		; not FAT32
 33265

 33267 000056B0 26C746390200            	mov	word [es:bp+DPB.FAT32_NXTFREE],2

 33269 000056B6 26895E3B                	mov	[es:bp+DPB.FAT32_NXTFREE+2],bx ; 0
 33270                                  ads3:
 33271 000056BA 891E[E80A]              	mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],bx ; 0
 33272                                  	;mov	word [es:bp+1Dh],2	
 33273 000056BE 26C7461D0200            	mov	word [es:bp+DPB.NEXT_FREE],2
 33274 000056C4 43                      	inc	bx ; 1
 33275                                  	;or	[es:bp+18h],bl
 33276 000056C5 26085E18                	or	[es:bp+DPB.FIRST_ACCESS],bl ; 1	
 33277                                  	;;;
 33278                                  %endif
 33279                                  
 33280                                  ;   Scanning both forwards and backwards for a free cluster
 33281                                  ;
 33282                                  ;       (BX) = forwards scan pointer
 33283                                  ;       (CX) = clusters remaining to be allocated
 33284                                  ;       (DX) = current last cluster in file
 33285                                  ;       (TOS) = last cluster of file

 33287                                  FINDFRE:

 33289                                          INC     BX
 33290                                  	;cmp	bx,[es:bp+0Dh]

 33296

 33298                                  ;
 33299                                  ;       (BX) = found free cluster #
 33300                                  ;       (DX) = current last cluster in file
 33301
