 33760                                  	; 28/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 33761                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 33762                                  	;;;
 33763 00005841 8916[EA0A]              	mov	[CLUSDATA_HW],dx ; (dx = 0, release)
 33764                                  	;;;
 33765                                  
 33766                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:9D19h
 33767                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8E88h)
 33768                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:0C285h)
 33769                                  
 33770                                  	;entry	RELBLKS
 33771                                  RELBLKS:
 33772                                  
 33773                                  ;   Enter here with DX=0FFFFH to put an end-of-file mark in the first cluster
 33774                                  ;   and free the rest in the chain.
 33775                                  
 33776 00005845 E80807                  	call	UNPACK
 33777                                  	;jc	short RELEASE_flush
 33778                                  	;jz	short RELEASE_flush
 33779                                  	; 28/12/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 33780 00005848 7652                            jbe	short RET12 ; jna short RET12
 33781                                  				; CCONTENT_HW:DI= Content of FAT
 33782                                   				; for given cluster (next cluster)
 33783 0000584A 89F8                    	MOV     AX,DI
 33784 0000584C 52                              PUSH    DX
 33785                                  
 33786                                  	;;; 28/12/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 33787                                  	;push	ax
 33788                                  	;;;
 33789                                  
 33790 0000584D E8AF07                  	call	PACK
 33791                                  
 33792                                  	;;; 28/12/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 33793                                  	;pop	ax
 33794 00005850 8B16[EC0A]              	mov	dx,[CCONTENT_HW]
 33795 00005854 8916[E80A]              	mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],dx ; next cluster (hw) to be released
 33796 00005858 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax		 ; next cluster (lw) to be released
 33797                                  	;;;
 33798                                          
 33799 0000585A 5A                      	POP     DX
 33800                                  	;jc	short RELEASE_flush
 33801                                  	; 28/12/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 33802 0000585B 723F                    	jc	short RET12
 33803                                          
 33804 0000585D 09D2                    	OR      DX,DX
 33805 0000585F 751F                            JNZ	short NO_DEALLOC	; Was putting EOF mark
 33806                                  
 33807                                  ; 28/02/2024
 33808                                  %if 0
 33809                                  	;;cmp	word [es:bp+1Eh],-1 ; MSDOS 3.3
 33810                                  	;cmp	word [es:bp+1Fh],-1 ; MSDOS 6.0
 33811                                  	CMP     word [ES:BP+DPB.FREE_CNT],-1 ; Free count valid?
 33812                                          JZ	short NO_DEALLOC	; No
 33813                                          INC	word [ES:BP+DPB.FREE_CNT] ; Increase free count by 1
 33814                                  NO_DEALLOC:
 33815                                          MOV     BX,AX
 33816                                          dec     ax              	; check for "1"
 33817                                  	jz	short RELEASE_flush	; is last cluster of incomplete chain
 33818                                  %else
 33819                                  	; 28/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 33820                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 33821                                  	;;;
 33822 00005861 3B16[EA0A]              	cmp	dx,[CLUSDATA_HW]	; > 0 ? (delete, release)
 33823 00005865 7519                    	jnz	short NO_DEALLOC	; no, EOF (allocate, -1), (dx = 0)
 33824                                  	;cmp	word [es:bp+1Fh],0FFFFh
 33825 00005867 26837E1FFF              	cmp	word [es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT],0FFFFh ; -1
 33826                                  					; Free count valid?
 33827 0000586C 7412                    	jz	short NO_DEALLOC	; No (dx = 0)
 33828                                  relblks_ifc:
 33829                                  	;inc	word ptr es:[bp+1Fh]
 33830 0000586E 26FF461F                	inc	word [ES:BP+DPB.FREE_CNT] ; Increase free count by 1
 33831 00005872 7519                    	jnz	short NO_DEALLOC2
 33832                                  
 33833                                  	;cmp	[es:bp+0Fh],dx
 33834 00005874 2639560F                	cmp	[es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE],dx
 33835 00005878 7513                    	jnz	short NO_DEALLOC2	; not FAT32
 33836                                  
 33837                                  	;inc	word [es:bp+21h]
 33838 0000587A 26FF4621                	inc	word [es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT+2]
 33839 0000587E EB0D                    	jmp	short NO_DEALLOC2
 33840                                  NO_DEALLOC:
 33841                                  	;cmp	[es:bp+0Fh],dx
 33842 00005880 2639560F                	cmp	[es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE],dx	; dx is -1 or 0
 33843                                  					; (valid 16 bit fat size is another number)
 33844 00005884 7507                    	jnz	short NO_DEALLOC2 ; FAT (FAT16 or FAT12)
 33845                                  					; dx = 0, FAT32
 33846                                  	;cmp	word [es:bp+21h],0FFFFh
 33847 00005886 26837E21FF              	cmp	word [es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT+2],0FFFFh
 33848 0000588B 75E1                    	jnz	short relblks_ifc
 33849                                  NO_DEALLOC2:
 33850 0000588D 833E[E80A]00            	cmp	word [CLUSTNUM_HW],0
 33851 00005892 7503                    	jnz	short NO_DEALLOC3
 33852 00005894 48                      	dec	ax			; check for "1"	
 33853 00005895 7405                    	jz	short RET12		; is last cluster of incomplete chain
 33854                                  NO_DEALLOC3:
 33855                                  	;;;
 33856                                  %endif
 33857                                  
 33858 00005897 E88D06                  	call	IsEOF
 33859 0000589A 72A3                            JB	short RELEASE	; Carry clear if JMP not taken
 33860                                  
 33861                                  	; 16/12/2022
 33862                                  ; 25/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 33863                                  ; 28/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 33864                                  %if 0
 33865                                  RELEASE_flush:
 33866                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 33867                                  	mov	al,[es:bp]
 33868                                  	;MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE]
 33869                                  	push	si		; FLUSHBUF may trash these and we guarantee
 33870                                  	push	cx		;  them to be preserved.
 33871                                  	push	es
 33872                                  	push	bp
 33873                                  	call	FLUSHBUF	; commit buffers for this drive
 33874                                  	pop	bp
 33875                                  	pop	es
 33876                                  	pop	cx
 33877                                  	pop	si
 33878                                  %endif		; 28/02/2024
 33879                                  
 33880                                  RET12:
 33881 0000589C C3                      	retn
 33882                                  
 33883                                  ;Break	<GETEOF -- Find the end of a file>
 33884                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33885                                  ;
 33886                                  ; Procedure Name : GETEOF
 33887                                  ;
 33888                                  ; Inputs:
 33889                                  ;       ES:BP Points to DPB
 33890                                  ;       BX = Cluster in a file
 33891                                  ;       DS = CS
 33892                                  ; Outputs:
 33893                                  ;       BX = Last cluster in the file
 33894                                  ;       Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 33895                                  ; DI destroyed. No other registers affected.
 33896                                  ;
 33897                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33898                                  
 33899                                  	; 28/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 33900                                  %if 0
 33901                                  GETEOF:
 33902                                  	call	UNPACK
 33903                                          jc	short RET12
 33904                                          PUSH    BX
 33905                                          MOV     BX,DI
 33906                                  	call	IsEOF
 33907                                          POP     BX
 33908                                          JAE     short RET12
 33909                                          MOV     BX,DI
 33910                                          JMP     short GETEOF
 33911                                  %else
 33912                                  	; 28/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 33913                                  	;;;
 33914                                  GETEOF4:	; **
 33915 0000589D 8F06[E80A]              	pop	word [CLUSTNUM_HW] ; * ; 28/02/2024
 33916                                  GETEOF1:
 33917 000058A1 89C7                    	mov	di,ax
 33918 000058A3 8916[F20A]              	mov	[CLUSTERS_HW],dx ; CLUSTERS_HW:DI = Cluster Count
 33919 000058A7 58                      	pop	ax
 33920 000058A8 5A                      	pop	dx
 33921 000058A9 C3                      	retn
 33922                                  
 33923                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:9D7Ch
 33924                                  GETEOF:
 33925 000058AA 52                      	push	dx
 33926 000058AB 50                      	push	ax
 33927 000058AC 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx ; 0	; cluster count = 0
 33928 000058AE 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 33929                                  GETEOF2:
 33930 000058B0 E89D06                  	call	UNPACK
 33931 000058B3 72EC                    	jc	short GETEOF1
 33932                                  		; CCONTENT_HW:DI = next cluster (cluster content)
 33933 000058B5 40                      	inc	ax
 33934 000058B6 7501                    	jnz	short GETEOF3
 33935 000058B8 42                      	inc	dx
 33936                                  GETEOF3:
 33937 000058B9 FF36[E80A]              	push	word [CLUSTNUM_HW] ; * ; 28/02/2024
 33938 000058BD 53                      	push    bx
 33939                                  	;push	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 33940 000058BE 8B1E[EC0A]              	mov	bx,[CCONTENT_HW]
 33941 000058C2 891E[E80A]              	mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],bx
 33942 000058C6 89FB                    	mov	bx,di
 33943 000058C8 E85C06                  	call	IsEOF
 33944                                  	;pop	word [CLUSTNUM_HW] ; * ; 28/02/2024
 33945 000058CB 5B                      	pop	bx
 33946                                  	;jae	short GETEOF1   ; EOF
 33947 000058CC 73CF                    	jae	short GETEOF4 ; ** ; 28/02/2024
 33948                                  	;mov	bx,[CCONTENT_HW] ; not EOF
 33949                                  	;mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],bx
 33950 000058CE 5B                      	pop	bx	; * ; 28/02/2024
 33951 000058CF 89FB                    	mov	bx,di
 33952 000058D1 EBDD                    	jmp	short GETEOF2   ; get next cluster
 33953                                  	;;;
 33954                                  %endif

 33996                                  ;
 33997                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33998                                  
 33999                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 34000                                  	; DOSCODE:8E77h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 34001                                  
 34002                                  	; 29/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 34003                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:9DB0h
 34004                                  
 34005                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8ED3h)
 34006                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:8D92h)
 34007                                  
 34008                                  MAKEFCB:
 34009                                  ;hkn; SS override
 34010                                  	;MOV	BYTE [SS:SpaceFlag],0
 34011 000058D3 30D2                    	XOR	DL,DL		; Flag--not ambiguous file name
 34012                                  	; 29/02/2024
 34013 000058D5 368816[4E03]            	mov	[ss:SpaceFlag],dl ; 0
 34014                                  	;test	al,2
 34015 000058DA A802                    	test	AL,DRVBIT	; Use current drive field if default?
 34016 000058DC 7503                    	JNZ	short DEFDRV
 34017                                  	;MOV	BYTE [ES:DI],0	; No - use default drive
 34018                                  	; 29/02/2024
 34019 000058DE 268815                  	mov	[es:di],dl ; 0
 34020                                  DEFDRV:
 34021 000058E1 47                      	INC	DI
 34022 000058E2 B90800                  	MOV	CX,8
 34023                                  	;test	al,4
 34024 000058E5 A804                    	test	AL,NAMBIT	; Use current name fields as default?
 34025 000058E7 93                      	XCHG	AX,BX		; Save bits in BX
 34026 000058E8 B020                    	MOV	AL," "
 34027 000058EA 7404                    	JZ	short FILLB	; If not, go fill with blanks
 34028 000058EC 01CF                    	ADD	DI,CX
 34029 000058EE 31C9                    	XOR	CX,CX		; Don't fill any
 34030                                  FILLB:
 34031 000058F0 F3AA                    	REP	STOSB
 34032 000058F2 B103                    	MOV	CL,3
 34033 000058F4 F6C308                  	test	BL,EXTBIT	; Use current extension as default
 34034 000058F7 7404                    	JZ	short FILLB2
 34035 000058F9 01CF                    	ADD	DI,CX
 34036 000058FB 31C9                    	XOR	CX,CX
 34037                                  FILLB2:
 34038 000058FD F3AA                    	REP	STOSB
 34039 000058FF 91                      	XCHG	AX,CX		; Put zero in AX
 34040 00005900 AB                      	STOSW
 34041 00005901 AB                      	STOSW			; Initialize two words after to zero
 34042 00005902 83EF10                  	SUB	DI,16		; Point back at start
 34043                                  	;test	bl,1
 34044 00005905 F6C301                  	test	BL,SCANSEPARATOR; Scan off separators if not zero
 34045 00005908 7409                    	JZ	short SKPSPC
 34046 0000590A E88800                  	CALL	SCANB		; Peel off blanks and tabs
 34047 0000590D E81E01                  	CALL	DELIM		; Is it a one-time-only delimiter?
 34048 00005910 7504                    	JNZ	short NOSCAN
 34049 00005912 46                      	INC	SI		; Skip over the delimiter
 34050                                  SKPSPC:
 34051 00005913 E87F00                  	CALL	SCANB		; Always kill preceding blanks and tabs
 34052                                  NOSCAN:
 34053 00005916 E8EC00                  	CALL	GETLET
 34054 00005919 761E                    	JBE	short NODRV	; Quit if termination character
 34055 0000591B 803C3A                  	CMP	BYTE [SI],":"	; Check for potential drive specifier
 34056 0000591E 7519                    	JNZ	short NODRV
 34057 00005920 46                      	INC	SI		; Skip over colon
 34058 00005921 2C40                    	SUB	AL,"@"          ; Convert drive letter to drive number (A=1)
 34059 00005923 760F                    	JBE	short BADDRV	; Drive letter out of range
 34060                                  
 34061 00005925 50                      	PUSH	AX
 34062 00005926 E8961E                  	call	GetVisDrv
 34063 00005929 58                      	POP	AX
 34064 0000592A 730A                    	JNC	short HAVDRV
 34065                                  
 34066                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34067                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 34068                                  ;hkn; SS override
 34069 0000592C 36803E[1006]1A          	CMP	byte [SS:DrvErr],error_not_DOS_disk ; 1Ah
 34070                                  					; if not FAT drive ;AN000;
 34071 00005932 7402                    	JZ	short HAVDRV		; assume ok	   ;AN000;
 34072                                  BADDRV:
 34073 00005934 B2FF                    	MOV	DL,-1
 34074                                  HAVDRV:
 34075 00005936 AA                      	STOSB			; Put drive specifier in first byte
 34076 00005937 46                      	INC	SI
 34077 00005938 4F                      	DEC	DI		; Counteract next two instructions
 34078                                  NODRV:
 34079 00005939 4E                      	DEC	SI		; Back up
 34080 0000593A 47                      	INC	DI		; Skip drive byte
 34081                                  
 34082                                  	;entry	NORMSCAN
 34083                                  NORMSCAN:
 34084 0000593B B90800                  	MOV	CX,8
 34085 0000593E E82200                  	CALL	GETWORD 	; Get 8-letter file name
 34086 00005941 803C2E                  	CMP	BYTE [SI],"."
 34087 00005944 7510                    	JNZ	short NODOT
 34088 00005946 46                      	INC	SI		; Skip over dot if present
 34089                                  
 34090                                  	; 24/09/2023
 34091                                  	;mov	cx,3
 34092 00005947 B103                    	mov	cl,3	; ch=0
 34093                                  
 34094                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 34095                                  ;hkn; SS override
 34096                                  	;TEST	word [SS:DOS34_FLAG],DBCS_VOLID2 ; 100h ;AN000;
 34097                                  	; 10/06/2019
 34098 00005949 36F606[1206]01          	test	byte [SS:DOS34_FLAG+1],(DBCS_VOLID2>>8) ; 1
 34099 0000594F 7402                    	JZ	short VOLOK				;AN000;
 34100 00005951 A4                      	MOVSB			; 2nd byte of DBCS	;AN000;
 34101                                  	; 24/09/2023
 34102                                  	;MOV	CX,2					;AN000;
 34103 00005952 49                      	dec	cx  ; cx=2
 34104                                  	;JMP	SHORT contvol				;AN000;
 34105                                  VOLOK:
 34106                                  	;MOV	CX,3		; Get 3-letter extension
 34107                                  contvol:
 34108 00005953 E81300                  	CALL	MUSTGETWORD
 34109                                  NODOT:
 34110 00005956 88D0                    	MOV	AL,DL
 34111                                  
 34112                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 34113                                  	;and	word [ss:DOS34_FLAG],0FEFFh
 34114                                  	; 18/12/2022
 34115 00005958 368026[1206]FE          	and	byte [ss:DOS34_FLAG+1],0FEh ; (~DBCS_VOLID2)>>8
 34116                                  	;and	word [ss:DOS34_FLAG],~DBCS_VOLID2 ; ### BUG FIX ###
 34117                                  
 34118 0000595E C3                      	retn
 34119                                  
 34120                                  NONAM:
 34121 0000595F 01CF                    	ADD	DI,CX
 34122 00005961 4E                      	DEC	SI
 34123 00005962 C3                      	retn
 34124                                  
 34125                                  GETWORD:
 34126 00005963 E89F00                  	CALL	GETLET		
 34127 00005966 76F7                    	JBE	short NONAM	; Exit if invalid character
 34128 00005968 4E                      	DEC	SI
 34129                                  
 34130                                  ;	UGH!!! Horrible bug here that should be fixed at some point:
 34131                                  ;	If the name we are scanning is longer than CX, we keep on reading!
 34132                                  
 34133                                  MUSTGETWORD:
 34134 00005969 E89900                  	CALL	GETLET
 34135                                  
 34136                                  ;	If spaceFlag is set then we allow spaces in a pathname
 34137                                  
 34138                                  ;IF NOT TABLELOOK
 34139                                  ;	JB	short FILLNAM  ; MSDOS 3.3
 34140                                  ;ENDIF
 34141 0000596C 750C                    	JNZ	short MustCheckCX
 34142                                  
 34143                                  ;hkn; SS override
 34144 0000596E 36F606[4E03]FF          	test	BYTE [SS:SpaceFlag],0FFh
 34145 00005974 7419                    	JZ	short FILLNAM
 34146 00005976 3C20                    	CMP	AL," "
 34147 00005978 7515                    	JNZ	short FILLNAM
 34148                                  
 34149                                  MustCheckCX:
 34150 0000597A E3ED                    	JCXZ	MUSTGETWORD
 34151 0000597C 49                      	DEC	CX
 34152 0000597D 3C2A                    	CMP	AL,"*"          ; Check for ambiguous file specifier
 34153 0000597F 7504                    	JNZ	short NOSTAR
 34154 00005981 B03F                    	MOV	AL,"?"
 34155 00005983 F3AA                    	REP	STOSB
 34156                                  NOSTAR:
 34157 00005985 AA                      	STOSB
 34158 00005986 3C3F                    	CMP	AL,"?"
 34159 00005988 75DF                    	JNZ	short MUSTGETWORD
 34160 0000598A 80CA01                  	OR	DL,1		; Flag ambiguous file name
 34161 0000598D EBDA                    	JMP	short MUSTGETWORD
 34162                                  FILLNAM:
 34163 0000598F B020                    	MOV	AL," "
 34164 00005991 F3AA                    	REP	STOSB
 34165 00005993 4E                      	DEC	SI
 34166 00005994 C3                      	retn
 34167                                  
 34168                                  SCANB:
 34169 00005995 AC                      	LODSB
 34170 00005996 E89D00                  	CALL	SPCHK
 34171 00005999 74FA                    	JZ	short SCANB
 34172 0000599B 4E                      	DEC	SI
 34173                                  scanb_retn:
 34174 0000599C C3                      	retn

 34176                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34177                                  ;
 34178                                  ; Procedure Name : NameTrans
 34179                                  ;
 34180                                  ; NameTrans is used by FindPath to scan off an element of a path. We must
 34181                                  ; allow spaces in pathnames
 34182                                  ;
 34183                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:SI points to start of path element
 34184                                  ;   Outputs:	Name1 has unpacked name, uppercased
 34185                                  ;		ES = DOSGroup
 34186                                  ;		DS:SI advanced after name
 34187                                  ;   Registers modified: DI,AX,DX,CX
 34188                                  ;
 34189                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34190                                  
 34191                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 34192                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34193                                  
 34194                                  	; 29/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 34195                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:9E7Ch
 34196                                  
 34197                                  NameTrans:
 34198                                  ;hkn; SS override
 34199 0000599D 36C606[4E03]01          	MOV	BYTE [SS:SpaceFlag],1
 34200 000059A3 16                      	push	ss
 34201 000059A4 07                      	pop	es
 34202                                  
 34203                                  ;hkn; NAME1 is in DOSDATA
 34204 000059A5 BF[4B05]                	MOV	DI,NAME1
 34205 000059A8 57                      	PUSH	DI
 34206                                  
 34207                                  ; 29/02/2024
 34208                                  %if 0
 34209                                  	MOV	AX,'  '	; 2020h
 34210                                  	MOV	CX,5
 34211                                  	STOSB
 34212                                  	REP	STOSW		; Fill "FCB" at NAME1 with spaces
 34213                                  	XOR	AL,AL		; Set stuff for NORMSCAN
 34214                                  	MOV	DL,AL
 34215                                  %else
 34216                                  	; 29/02/2024
 34217                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 34218                                  	;;;
 34219 000059A9 B020                    	mov     al, 20h ; ' '
 34220 000059AB B90B00                  	mov     cx, 11
 34221 000059AE F3AA                    	rep stosb               ; Fill "FCB" at NAME1 with spaces
 34222 000059B0 91                      	xchg    ax, cx
 34223 000059B1 99                      	cwd
 34224                                  	;;;
 34225                                  %endif
 34226                                  
 34227 000059B2 AA                      	STOSB
 34228 000059B3 5F                      	POP	DI
 34229                                  
 34230 000059B4 E884FF                  	CALL	NORMSCAN
 34231                                  
 34232                                  ;hkn; SS override for NAME1
 34233 000059B7 36803E[4B05]E5          	CMP	byte [SS:NAME1],0E5H
 34234 000059BD 75DD                    	jnz	short scanb_retn
 34235 000059BF 36C606[4B05]05          	MOV	byte [SS:NAME1],5 ; Magic name translation
 34236 000059C5 C3                      	retn

 34238                                  ;Break	<GETLET, DELIM -- CHECK CHARACTERS AND CONVERT>
 34239                                  ;============================================================================
 34240                                  
 34241                                  ; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34242                                  ; DOSCODE:8FD2h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 34243                                  
 34244                                  ;If TableLook
 34245                                  
 34246                                  ;hkn; Table	SEGMENT
 34247                                  ;	PUBLIC	CharType
 34248                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34249                                  
 34250                                  ; Character type table for file name scanning
 34251                                  ; Table provides a mapping of characters to validity bits.
 34252                                  ; Four bits are provided for each character. Values 7Dh and above
 34253                                  ; have all bits set, so that part of the table is chopped off, and
 34254                                  ; the translation routine is responsible for screening these values.
 34255                                  ; The bit values are defined in DOSSYM.INC
 34256                                  
 34257                                  ;	      ; ^A and NUL
 34258                                  ;CharType:
 34259                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34260                                  ;	      ; ^C and ^B
 34261                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34262                                  ;	      ; ^E and ^D
 34263                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34264                                  ;	      ; ^G and ^F
 34265                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34266                                  ;	      ; TAB and BS
 34267                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM+FSPCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34268                                  ;	      ; ^K and ^J
 34269                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34270                                  ;	      ; ^M and ^L
 34271                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34272                                  ;	      ; ^O and ^N
 34273                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34274                                  ;	      ; ^Q and ^P
 34275                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34276                                  ;	      ; ^S and ^R
 34277                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34278                                  ;	      ; ^U and ^T
 34279                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34280                                  ;	      ; ^W and ^V
 34281                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34282                                  ;	      ; ^Y and ^X
 34283                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34284                                  ;	      ; ESC and ^Z
 34285                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34286                                  ;	      ; ^] and ^;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34288                                  ;	      ; ^_ and ^^
 34289                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34290                                  ;	      ; ! and SPACE
 34291                                  ;	 db   LOW (NOT FCHK+FDELIM+FSPCHK)
 34292                                  ;	      ; # and "
 34293                                  ;	 db   LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK)
 34294                                  ;	      ; $ - )
 34295                                  ;	 db   3 dup (0FFh)
 34296                                  ;	      ; + and *
 34297                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM) SHL 4) OR 0Fh
 34298                                  ;	      ; - and '
 34299                                  ;	 db   NOT (FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM)
 34300                                  ;	      ; / and .
 34301                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34302                                  ;	      ; 0 - 9
 34303                                  ;	 db   5 dup (0FFh)
 34304                                  ;	      ; ; and :
 34305                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM) AND 0Fh
 34306                                  ;	      ; = and <
 34307                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM) AND 0Fh
 34308                                  ;	      ; ? and >
 34309                                  ;	 db   NOT FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM
 34310                                  ;	      ; A - Z
 34311                                  ;	 db   13 dup (0FFh)
 34312                                  ;	      ; \ and [
 34313                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR 0Fh
 34314                                  ;	      ; ^ and ]
 34315                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34316                                  ;	      ; _ - {
 34317                                  ;	 db   15 dup (0FFh)
 34318                                  ;	      ; } and |
 34319                                  ;	 db   NOT FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM
 34320                                  
 34321                                  ;CharType_last equ ($ - CharType) * 2	; This is the value of the last
 34322                                  ;					; character in the table
 34323                                  
 34324                                  ;FCHK	equ 1		; normal name char, no chks needed
 34325                                  ;FDELIM	equ 2		; is a delimiter
 34326                                  ;FSPCHK	equ 4		; set if character is not a space or equivalent
 34327                                  ;FFCB	equ 8		; is valid in an FCB
 34328                                  
 34329                                  ; DOSCODE:8FD2h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 34330                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34331                                  ; DOSCODE:8F76h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 34332                                  
 34333                                  CharType: ; 63 bytes
 34334 000059C6 6666666606666666                db  66h, 66h, 66h, 66h, 06h, 66h, 66h, 66h ; 0-7
 34335 000059CE 6666666666666666        	db  66h, 66h, 66h, 66h, 66h, 66h, 66h, 66h ; 8-15
 34336 000059D6 F8F6FFFFFF4FF46E        	db 0F8h,0F6h,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh, 4Fh,0F4h, 6Eh ; 16-23
 34337 000059DE FFFFFFFFFF4444F4        	db 0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh, 44h, 44h,0F4h ; 24-31
 34338 000059E6 FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF        	db 0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh ; 32-39
 34339 000059EE FFFFFFFFFF6F66FF        	db 0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh, 6Fh, 66h,0FFh ; 40-47
 34340 000059F6 FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF        	db 0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh ; 48-55
 34341 000059FE FFFFFFFFFFFFF4          	db 0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh,0F4h	   ; 56-62
 34342                                  
 34343                                  CharType_last equ ($ - CharType) * 2
 34344                                  
 34345                                  ; Offset 12CAh of IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3), 1987
 34346                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34347                                  ;CharType:
 34348                                  ;       db 0F6h,0F6h,0F6h,0F6h,0F6h,0F6h,0F6h,0F6h
 34349                                  ;	db 0F6h,0F0h,0F6h,0F6h,0F6h,0F6h,0F6h,0F6h
 34350                                  ;	db 0F6h,0F6h,0F6h,0F6h,0F6h,0F6h,0F6h,0F6h
 34351                                  ;	db 0F6h,0F6h,0F6h,0F6h,0F6h,0F6h,0F6h,0F6h

 34384                                  
 34385                                  ; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34386                                  ; DOSCODE:9011h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 34387                                  
 34388                                  ; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 34389                                  ; DOSCODE:8FB5h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 34390                                  
 34391                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34392                                  ;
 34393                                  ; Procedure Names : GetLet, UCase, GetLet3
 34394                                  ;
 34395                                  ; These routines take a character, convert it to upper case, and check
 34396                                  ; for delimiters.  Three different entry points:
 34397                                  ;	GetLet -  DS:[SI] = character to convert
 34398                                  ;	UCase  -  AL = character to convert
 34399                                  ;	GetLet3 - AL = character
 34400                                  ;		  [BX] = translation table to use
 34401                                  ;
 34402                                  ;	Exit (in all cases) : AL = upper case character
 34403                                  ;			      CY set if char is control char other than TAB
 34404                                  ;			      ZF set if char is a delimiter
 34405                                  ;	Uses : AX, flags
 34406                                  ;
 34407                                  ; NOTE: This routine exists in a fast table lookup version, and a slow
 34408                                  ; inline version.  Return with carry set is only possible in the inline
 34409                                  ; version. The table lookup version is the one in use.
 34410                                  ;
 34411                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34412                                  
 34413                                  ; This entry point has character at [SI]
 34414                                  
 34415                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset 5517h
 34416                                  GETLET:	
 34417 00005A05 AC                      	LODSB
 34418                                  
 34419                                  ; This entry point has character in AL
 34420                                  
 34421                                  	;entry	UCase
 34422                                  UCase:	
 34423                                  	; 09/08/2018
 34424                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset 5518h
 34425                                  _UCase:
 34426 00005A06 53                      	PUSH	BX
 34427 00005A07 BB[7E0B]                	MOV	BX,FILE_UCASE_TAB+2
 34428                                  
 34429                                  ; Convert the character in AL to upper case
 34430                                  
 34431                                  gl_0:
 34432 00005A0A 3C61                    	CMP	AL,"a"
 34433 00005A0C 7214                    	JB	short gl_2	; Already upper case, go check type
 34434 00005A0E 3C7A                    	CMP	AL,"z"
 34435 00005A10 7702                    	JA	short gl_1
 34436 00005A12 2C20                    	SUB	AL,20H		; Convert to upper case
 34437                                  
 34438                                  ; Map European character to upper case
 34439                                  
 34440                                  gl_1:
 34441 00005A14 3C80                    	CMP	AL,80H
 34442 00005A16 720A                    	JB	short gl_2	; Not EuroChar, go check type
 34443 00005A18 2C80                    	SUB	AL,80H		; translate to upper case with this index
 34444                                  
 34445                                  	; M048 - Start 
 34446                                  	; Lantastic call Ucase thru int 2f without setting SS to DOSDATA.
 34447                                  	; So we shall set up DS and to access FILE_UCASE_TAB in BX and also 
 34448                                  	; preserve it.
 34449                                  
 34450                                  	; 09/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 34451                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 34452                                  	;;XLAT	BYTE [CS:BX]	; ds as file_ucase_tab is in DOSDATA
 34453                                  	;CS	XLAT
 34454                                  
 34455                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34456                                  
 34457                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 34458 00005A1A 1E                      	push	ds
 34459                                  	;getdseg <ds>
 34460 00005A1B 2E8E1E[0700]            	mov	ds,[cs:DosDSeg]
 34461 00005A20 D7                      	XLAT			; ds as file_ucase_tab is in DOSDATA
 34462 00005A21 1F                      	pop	ds
 34463                                  
 34464                                  	; M048 - End
 34465                                  
 34466                                  ; Now check the type
 34467                                  
 34468                                  ;If TableLook
 34469                                  gl_2:
 34470                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34471 00005A22 50                      	PUSH	AX
 34472                                  
 34473                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 34474                                  	;mov	bx,CharType
 34475                                  	;; 09/08/2018
 34476                                  	;;xlat	byte [cs:bx]
 34477                                  	;cs	xlat	
 34478                                  	
 34479                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 34480 00005A23 E81800                  	CALL	GetCharType	; returns type flags in AL
 34481                                  	
 34482                                  	;test	al,1	
 34483 00005A26 A801                    	TEST	AL,FCHK 	; test for normal character
 34484 00005A28 58                      	POP	AX
 34485                                  
 34486 00005A29 5B                      	POP	BX
 34487 00005A2A C3                      	RETN
 34488                                  
 34489                                  ; This entry has character in AL and lookup table in BX
 34490                                  
 34491                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 34492                                  ;	;entry GetLet3
 34493                                  GETLET3: ; 10/08/2018
 34494 00005A2B 53                      	PUSH	BX
 34495 00005A2C EBDC                    	JMP	short gl_0
 34496                                  ;ELSE
 34497                                  ;
 34498                                  ;gl_2:
 34499                                  ;	POP	BX
 34500                                  ;	CMP	AL,"."
 34501                                  ;	retz
 34502                                  ;	CMP	AL,'"'
 34503                                  ;	retz
 34504                                  ;	CALL	PATHCHRCMP
 34505                                  ;	retz
 34506                                  ;	CMP	AL,"["
 34507                                  ;	retz
 34508                                  ;	CMP	AL,"]"
 34509                                  ;	retz
 34510                                  ;ENDIF
 34511                                  
 34512                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------
 34513                                  ;
 34514                                  ; DELIM - check if character is a delimiter
 34515                                  ;	Entry : AX = character to check
 34516                                  ;	Exit  : ZF set if character is not a delimiter
 34517                                  ;	Uses  : Flags
 34518                                  ;
 34519                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
 34520                                  
 34521                                  	;entry	DELIM
 34522                                  DELIM:
 34523                                  ;IF TableLook
 34524                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34525 00005A2E 50                      	PUSH	AX
 34526                                  
 34527                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 34528                                  	;push	bx
 34529                                  	;mov	bx,CharType
 34530                                  	;;09/08/2018
 34531                                  	;;xlat	byte [cs:bx]
 34532                                  	;cs	xlat
 34533                                  	;pop	bx
 34534                                  
 34535                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 34536 00005A2F E80C00                  	CALL	GetCharType
 34537                                  	
 34538                                  	;test	al,2
 34539 00005A32 A802                    	TEST	AL,FDELIM
 34540 00005A34 58                      	POP	AX
 34541 00005A35 C3                      	RETN
 34542                                  ;ELSE
 34543                                  ;	CMP	AL,":"
 34544                                  ;	retz
 34545                                  ;
 34546                                  ;	CMP	AL,"<"
 34547                                  ;	retz
 34548                                  ;	CMP	AL,"|"
 34549                                  ;	retz
 34550                                  ;	CMP	AL,">"
 34551                                  ;	retz
 34552                                  ;
 34553                                  ;	CMP	AL,"+"
 34554                                  ;	retz
 34555                                  ;	CMP	AL,"="
 34556                                  ;	retz
 34557                                  ;	CMP	AL,";"
 34558                                  ;	retz
 34559                                  ;	CMP	AL,","
 34560                                  ;	retz
 34561                                  ;ENDIF
 34562                                  
 34563                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34564                                  ;
 34565                                  ;  SPCHK - checks to see if a character is a space or equivalent
 34566                                  ;	Entry : AL = character to check
 34567                                  ;	Exit  : ZF set if character is a space
 34568                                  ;	Uses  : flags
 34569                                  ;
 34570                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34571                                  
 34572                                  	;entry SPCHK
 34573                                  SPCHK:
 34574                                  ;IF TableLook
 34575                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34576 00005A36 50                      	PUSH	AX
 34577                                  
 34578                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 34579                                  	;push	bx
 34580                                  	;mov	bx,CharType
 34581                                  	;; 09/08/2018
 34582                                  	;;xlat	byte [cs:bx]
 34583                                  	;cs	xlat
 34584                                  	;pop	bx
 34585                                  
 34586                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 34587 00005A37 E80400                  	CALL	GetCharType
 34588                                  	
 34589                                  	;test	al,4
 34590 00005A3A A804                    	TEST	AL,FSPCHK
 34591 00005A3C 58                      	POP	AX
 34592 00005A3D C3                      	RETN
 34593                                  ;ELSE
 34594                                  ;	CMP	AL,9		; Filter out tabs too
 34595                                  ;	retz
 34596                                  ;; WARNING! " " MUST be the last compare
 34597                                  ;	CMP	AL," "
 34598                                  ;	return
 34599                                  ;ENDIF
 34600                                  
 34601                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34602                                  ;
 34603                                  ;  GetCharType - return flag bits indicating character type
 34604                                  ;	Bits are defined in DOSSYM.INC. Uses lookup table
 34605                                  ;	defined above at label CharType.
 34606                                  ;
 34607                                  ;	Entry : AL = character to return type flags for
 34608                                  ;	Exit  : AL = type flags
 34609                                  ;	Uses  : AL, flags
 34610                                  ;
 34611                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34612                                  
 34613                                  	; 29/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 34614                                  
 34615                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 34616                                  
 34617                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34618                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 34619                                  
 34620                                  GetCharType:
 34621                                  	;cmp	al,7Eh
 34622 00005A3E 3C7E                    	cmp	al,CharType_last 	; beyond end of table?
 34623 00005A40 7314                    	jae	short gct_90		; return standard value
 34624                                  
 34625 00005A42 53                      	push	bx
 34626 00005A43 BB[C659]                	mov	bx,CharType		; load lookup table
 34627 00005A46 D0E8                    	shr	al,1			; adjust for half-byte table entry size
 34628                                  	;xlat	cs:[bx] 		; get flags
 34629 00005A48 2ED7                    	cs	xlat	
 34630 00005A4A 5B                      	pop	bx
 34631                                  
 34632                                  ; carry clear from previous shift means we want the low nibble.  Otherwise
 34633                                  ; we have to shift the flags down to the low nibble
 34634                                  
 34635 00005A4B 7306                    	jnc	short gct_80		; carry clear, no shift needed
 34636                                  
 34637                                  ; 29/02/2024
 34638                                  %if 0
 34639                                  	shr	al,1			; we want high nibble, shift it down
 34640                                  	shr	al,1
 34641                                  	shr	al,1
 34642                                  	shr	al,1
 34643                                  %else
 34644                                  	; 29/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 34645                                  	;;;
 34646 00005A4D 51                      	push	cx
 34647 00005A4E B104                    	mov	cl,4			; we want high nibble, shift it down
 34648 00005A50 D2E8                    	shr	al,cl
 34649 00005A52 59                      	pop	cx
 34650                                  	;;;
 34651                                  %endif
 34652                                  
 34653                                  gct_80:
 34654 00005A53 240F                    	and	al,0Fh			; clear the unused nibble
 34655 00005A55 C3                      	retn
 34656                                  gct_90:
 34657 00005A56 B00F                    	mov	al,0Fh			; set all flags
 34658 00005A58 C3                      	retn
 34659                                  
 34660                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34661                                  ;
 34662                                  ; Procedure : PATHCHRCMP
 34663                                  ;
 34664                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34665                                  
 34666                                  PATHCHRCMP:
 34667 00005A59 3C2F                    	CMP	AL,'/'
 34668 00005A5B 7606                    	JBE	short PathRet
 34669 00005A5D 3C5C                    	CMP	AL,'\'
 34670 00005A5F C3                      	retn
 34671                                  GotFor:
 34672 00005A60 B05C                    	MOV	AL,'\'
 34673 00005A62 C3                      	retn
 34674                                  PathRet:
 34675 00005A63 74FB                    	JZ	short GotFor
 34676 00005A65 C3                      	retn

 34686                                  
 34687                                  ;**	MSCTRLC.ASM - ^C and error handler for MSDOS
 34688                                  
 34689                                  ;	TITLE	Control C detection, Hard error and EXIT routines
 34690                                  ;	NAME	IBMCTRLC
 34691                                  
 34692                                  ;**	Low level routines for detecting special characters on CON input,
 34693                                  ;	the ^C exit/int code, the Hard error INT 24 code, the
 34694                                  ;	process termination code, and the INT 0 divide overflow handler.
 34695                                  ;
 34696                                  ;	FATAL
 34697                                  ;	FATAL1
 34698                                  ;	reset_environment
 34699                                  ;	DSKSTATCHK
 34700                                  ;	SPOOLINT
 34701                                  ;	STATCHK
 34702                                  ;	CNTCHAND
 34703                                  ;	DIVOV
 34704                                  ;	CHARHARD
 34705                                  ;	HardErr
 34706                                  ;
 34707                                  ;	Revision history:
 34708                                  ;
 34709                                  ;	    AN000	version 4.0   Jan 1988
 34710                                  ;	    A002	PTM    -- dir >lpt3 hangs
 34711                                  ;	    A003	PTM 3957- fake version for IBMCAHE.COM
 34712                                  ;
 34713                                  ; 	M011: NEC's 8086 clone chip uses Intel's undocumented bit number in
 34714                                  ;	      flags register. In order to return to user normally DOS used to
 34715                                  ;	      move F202 into flags, which sets bit number 1 in flags uncondit-
 34716                                  ;	      ionally. Now it is modified to maintain the state of bit 1.
 34717                                  ;
 34718                                  ; 	M024: suppressed fail and ignore options if not in the middle of int

 34720                                  ;	      charhard.

 35027                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35028                                  ;
 35029                                  ; Procedure Name : CNTHAND ( CTRLC_C HANDLER )
 35030                                  ;
 35031                                  ; "^C" and CR/LF is printed. Then the user registers are restored and the
 35032                                  ; user CTRL-C handler is executed. At this point the top of the stack has 1)
 35033                                  ; the interrupt return address should the user CTRL-C handler wish to allow
 35034                                  ; processing to continue; 2) the original interrupt return address to the code
 35035                                  ; that performed the function call in the first place. If the user CTRL-C
 35036                                  ; handler wishes to continue, it must leave all registers unchanged and RET
 35037                                  ; (not IRET) with carry CLEAR. If carry is SET then an terminate system call
 35038                                  ; is simulated.
 35039                                  ;
 35040                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35041                                  
 35042                                  	; 29/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 35043                                  
 35044                                  CNTCHAND:
 35045                                  	; MSDOS 6.0			; SS override
 35046                                  					; AN002; from RAWOUT
 35047                                  	;TEST	word [SS:DOS34_FLAG],CTRL_BREAK_FLAG  
 35048                                  	;JNZ	short around_deadlock 	; AN002;
 35049                                  
 35050                                  	; 05/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35051                                  	; (MSDOS 6.21 MSDOS.SYS DOSCODE:91C4h, 29/12/2022)
 35052 00005BAE 36F606[1206]02          	TEST	byte [SS:DOS34_FLAG+1],(CTRL_BREAK_FLAG>>8)  ; 2 
 35053 00005BB4 7508                    	JNZ	short around_deadlock 	; AN002;
 35054                                  
 35055 00005BB6 B003                            MOV     AL,3			; Display "^C"
 35056 00005BB8 E8C0C0                          CALL	BUFOUT
 35057 00005BBB E855BF                          CALL	CRLF
 35058                                  around_deadlock:
 35059 00005BBE 16                              PUSH    SS
 35060 00005BBF 1F                              POP     DS
 35061 00005BC0 803E[5703]00                    CMP     BYTE [CONSWAP],0
 35062 00005BC5 7403                            JZ      SHORT NOSWAP
 35063 00005BC7 E82DDE                          CALL	SWAPBACK
 35064                                  NOSWAP:
 35065 00005BCA FA                      	CLI				; Prepare to play with stack
 35066 00005BCB 8E16[8605]              	MOV	SS,[USER_SS]		; User stack now restored
 35067 00005BCF 8B26[8405]              	MOV	SP,[USER_SP]
 35068 00005BD3 E87FA8                          CALL	restore_world       ; User registers now restored
 35069                                  
 35070                                  	; 30/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0 
 35071                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (IBMDOS.COM - Offset 56ACh)
 35072                                          ; 14/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0
 35073                                  	;MOV	BYTE [CS:INDOS],0	
 35074                                          ;MOV	BYTE [CS:ERRORMODE],0
 35075                                          ;MOV	[CS:ConC_Spsave],SP
 35076                                  	;clc	;30/07/2018
 35077                                          ;INT	int_ctrl_c ; 23h    ; Execute user Ctrl-C handler
 35078                                  	;;int	23h	; DOS - CONTROL "C" EXIT ADDRESS
 35079                                  			; Return: return via RETF 2 with CF set
 35080                                  			; DOS will abort program with errorlevel 0
 35081                                  			; else
 35082                                  			; interrupted DOS call continues
 35083                                  
 35084                                  	; 05/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35085                                  	; MSDOS 6.0 (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS,91ECh) 
 35086                                  
 35087                                  	; CS was used to address these variables. We have to use DOSDATA
 35088                                  	
 35089 00005BD6 07                      	pop	es ; *	; MSDOS 6.21 (MSDOS.SYS, DOSCODE:91ECh)
 35090                                  			; (pop es, after 'call restore_world')	
 35091 00005BD7 1E                      	push	ds
 35092                                  	;getdseg <ds>			; ds -> dosdata
 35093 00005BD8 2E8E1E[0700]            	mov	ds,[cs:DosDSeg]
 35094 00005BDD C606[2103]00            	mov	byte [INDOS],0		; Go to known state
 35095                                  	; 29/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 35096                                  	;;;
 35097 00005BE2 C606[C011]00            	mov	byte [INDOS_FLAG],0	; 2nd 'in dos' flag (what for?)
 35098                                  	;;;
 35099 00005BE7 C606[2003]00            	mov	byte [ERRORMODE],0
 35100 00005BEC 8926[3203]              	mov	[ConC_Spsave],SP	; save his SP
 35101                                  	; User SP has changed because of push. Adjust for it
 35102 00005BF0 8306[3203]02            	add	word [ConC_Spsave],2
 35103                                  
 35104 00005BF5 803E[660D]00            	cmp	byte [DosHasHMA],0	; Q: is dos running in HMA (M021)
 35105 00005BFA 1F                       	pop	ds	; restore ds
 35106 00005BFB 7505                    	jne	short do_low_int23	; Y: the int must be done from low mem
 35107 00005BFD F8                      	CLC				
 35108 00005BFE CD23                    	INT	int_ctrl_c  ; int 23h	; N: Execute user Ctrl-C handler
 35109 00005C00 EB06                    	jmp	short ctrlc_ret_addr
 35110                                  
 35111                                  	; 05/05/2019
 35112                                  do_low_int23:
 35113 00005C02 F8                      	clc
 35114 00005C03 2EFF1E[665A]            	call	far [cs:LowInt23Addr]
 35115                                  
 35116                                  	; 30/07/2018 
 35117                                  
 35118                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (IBMDOS.COM - Offset 56C0h)
 35119                                  
 35120                                  ; The user has returned to us. The circumstances we allow are:
 35121                                  ;
 35122                                  ;   IRET	We retry the operation by redispatching the system call
 35123                                  ;   CLC/RETF	POP the stack and retry
 35124                                  ;   ... 	Exit the current process with ^C exit
 35125                                  ;
 35126                                  ; User's may RETURN to us and leave interrupts on. 
 35127                                  ; Turn 'em off just to be sure
 35128                                  
 35129                                  ctrlc_ret_addr: ; 05/05/2019
 35130                                  
 35131 00005C08 FA                      	CLI
 35132                                  
 35133                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 
 35134                                  	;MOV	[CS:USER_IN_AX],ax	; save the AX
 35135                                  	;PUSHF				; and the flags (maybe new call)
 35136                                  	;POP	AX
 35137                                  
 35138                                  	; 05/05/2019
 35139                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 35140                                  
 35141                                  	; We have to use DOSDATA for these variables. Previously CS was used 
 35142                                  
 35143 00005C09 50                      	push	ax
 35144 00005C0A 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 35145                                  	;getdseg <ds>			; ds -> dosdata
 35146 00005C0C 2E8E1E[0700]            	mov	ds,[cs:DosDSeg]
 35147 00005C11 A3[630D]                	mov	[TEMPSEG],ax
 35148 00005C14 58                      	pop	ax
 35149 00005C15 A3[3A03]                	MOV	[USER_IN_AX],ax		; save the AX
 35150 00005C18 9C                      	pushf				; and the flags (maybe new call)
 35151 00005C19 58                      	pop	ax
 35152                                  
 35153                                  ; See if the input stack is identical to the output stack
 35154                                  
 35155                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 35156                                  	;CMP	SP,[CS:ConC_Spsave]
 35157                                  	;JNZ	SHORT ctrlc_try_new	; current SP not the same as saved SP
 35158                                  
 35159                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 35160 00005C1A 3B26[3203]              	CMP	SP,[ConC_Spsave]
 35161 00005C1E 750A                    	JNZ	SHORT ctrlc_try_new	; current SP not the same as saved SP
 35162                                  
 35163                                  ; Repeat the operation by redispatching the system call.
 35164                                  
 35165                                  ctrlc_repeat:
 35166                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 35167                                  	;MOV	AX,[CS:USER_IN_AX]
 35168                                  	; 05/05/2019
 35169                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 35170 00005C20 A1[3A03]                	mov	ax,[USER_IN_AX]
 35171 00005C23 8E1E[630D]              	mov	ds,[TEMPSEG]		; restore ds and original sp
 35172                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0 
 35173                                  	;transfer COMMAND
 35174                                  COMMANDJ:
 35175 00005C27 E9DBA6                  	JMP	COMMAND
 35176                                  
 35177                                  ; The current SP is NOT the same as the input SP. Presume that he 
 35178                                  ; RETF'd leaving some flags on the stack and examine the input
 35179                                  
 35180                                  ctrlc_try_new:
 35181                                  	; 29/02/2024
 35182                                  	;ADD	SP,2			; pop those flags

 35393                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35394                                  ;
 35395                                  ; Procedure Name : HardErr
 35396                                  ;
 35397                                  ; Hard disk error handler. Entry conditions:
 35398                                  ;	DS:BX = Original disk transfer address
 35399                                  ;	DX = Original logical sector number
 35400                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors to go (first one gave the error)
 35401                                  ;	AX = Hardware error code
 35402                                  ;	DI = Original sector transfer count	
 35403                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 35404                                  ;	[READOP] = 0 for read, 1 for write
 35405                                  ;	Allowed Set with allowed responses to this error (other bits MUST BE 0)
 35406                                  ; Output:
 35407                                  ;	[FAILERR] will be set if user responded FAIL
 35408                                  ;
 35409                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35410                                  
 35411                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 35412                                  	; 29/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 35413                                  HARDERR:
 35414                                  	; 05/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35415                                  	; 30/07/2018
 35416                                  	; 08/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0

 35418                                  	;and	di,0FFh

 35425                                  	; 25/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)

 35427                                  	;;MOV	AL,[ES:BP+0]

 35430                                  		; 15/03/2018

 35468                                  	;cmp	dx,[es:bp+2Bh]

 35470 00005D0B 5A                      	pop	dx

 35472                                  	;cmp	dx,[es:bp+29h]

 35554                                  ;

 35558                                  ;	EXITHOLD set for restore of ES:BP.

 35562                                  GOT_RIGHT_CODE:

 35571                                      
 35572                                  	; Wango!!! We may need to free some user state info... In 
 35573                                  	; particular, we may have locked down a JFN for a user and he may
 35574                                  	; NEVER return to us. Thus,we need to free it here and then
 35575                                  	; reallocate it when we come back.

 35631                                  	;MOV	SS,BP
 35632                                  	; 30/06/2024
 35633 00005DD1 06                      	push	es
 35634 00005DD2 17                      	pop	ss
 35635                                  passi24:
 35636 00005DD3 368B26[8805]            	MOV	SP,[SS:CONTSTK]
 35637 00005DD8 36FE06[2103]            	INC	BYTE [SS:INDOS]		; Back in the DOS
 35638                                  
 35639                                  	; 29/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 35640                                  	;;;
 35641 00005DDD 36FE06[C011]            	inc	byte [ss:INDOS_FLAG]
 35642                                  	;;;
 35643                                  
 35644 00005DE2 36C606[2003]00          	MOV	BYTE [SS:ERRORMODE],0	; Back from INT 24
 35645 00005DE8 FB                      	STI
 35646                                  FailRet:
 35647 00005DE9 36C42E[8005]            	LES	BP,[SS:EXITHOLD]
 35648                                  	
 35649                                  	; 08/07/2018
 35650                                  
 35651                                  	; Triage the user's reply.
 35652                                  
 35653 00005DEE 3C01                    	CMP	AL,1
 35654 00005DF0 723D                    	JB	short CheckIgnore	; 0 => ignore
 35655 00005DF2 7445                    	JZ	short CheckRetry	; 1 => retry
 35656 00005DF4 3C03                    	CMP	AL,3			; 3 => fail
 35657 00005DF6 7549                    	JNZ	short DoAbort 		; 2, invalid => abort
 35658                                  
 35659                                  	; The reply was fail. See if we are allowed to fail.
 35660                                  
 35661                                  					; SS override for ALLOWED, EXTOPEN_ON,
 35662                                  					; ALLOWED, FAILERR, WPERR, SFN, pJFN
 35663                                  	;test	byte [ss:ALLOWED],8
 35664 00005DF8 36F606[4B03]08          	test	byte [ss:ALLOWED],Allowed_FAIL ; Can we?
 35665 00005DFE 7441                    	jz	short DoAbort		; No, do abort
 35666                                  DoFail:
 35667 00005E00 B003                    	MOV	AL,3			; just in case...
 35668                                  					; AN000;EO. I24 error disabled

 35673

 35675                                  CleanUp:

 35677 00005E15 36833E[AA05]FF          	CMP	word [SS:SFN],-1
 35678                                  	; 25/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 35679                                  	;jnz	short CleanUp2
 35680                                  	;retn
 35681                                  	; 17/12/2022
 35682 00005E1B 7411                    	jz	short Cleanup_retn ; 08/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 35683                                  CleanUp2:
 35684 00005E1D 1E                      	push	ds
 35685 00005E1E 56                      	push	si
 35686 00005E1F 50                      	push	ax
 35687 00005E20 36A1[AA05]              	MOV	AX,[ss:SFN]
 35688 00005E24 36C536[AE05]            	LDS	SI,[ss:PJFN]
 35689 00005E29 8804                    	MOV	[SI],AL
 35690 00005E2B 58                      	pop	ax
 35691 00005E2C 5E                      	pop	si
 35692 00005E2D 1F                      	pop	ds
 35693                                  Cleanup_retn:
 35694 00005E2E C3                      	retn
 35695                                  
 35696                                  	; The reply was IGNORE. See if we are allowed to ignore.
 35697                                  
 35698                                  CheckIgnore:
 35699                                  	;test	byte [ss:ALLOWED],20h
 35700 00005E2F 36F606[4B03]20          	test	byte [ss:ALLOWED],Allowed_IGNORE ; Can we?
 35701                                  CheckRI:	; 29/02/2024
 35702 00005E35 74C9                    	jz	short DoFail			; No, do fail
 35703 00005E37 EBD6                    	jmp	short CleanUp
 35704                                  
 35705                                  	; The reply was RETRY. See if we are allowed to retry.
 35706                                  
 35707                                  CheckRetry:

 35709 00005E39 36F606[4B03]10          	test	byte [ss:ALLOWED],Allowed_RETRY	; Can we?
 35710                                  	;jz	short DoFail			; No, do fail
 35711                                  	;JMP	short CleanUp
 35712                                  	; 29/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 35713 00005E3F EBF4                    	jmp	short CheckRI
 35714                                  	
 35715                                  	; The reply was ABORT.
 35716                                  DoAbort:
 35717 00005E41 16                      	push	ss
 35718 00005E42 1F                      	pop	ds
 35719                                  
 35720 00005E43 803E[5703]00            	CMP	byte [CONSWAP],0
 35721 00005E48 7403                    	JZ	short NOSWAP2
 35722 00005E4A E8AADB                  	call	SWAPBACK
 35723                                  NOSWAP2:
 35724                                  	; See if we are to truly abort. If we are in the process of aborting, 
 35725                                  	; turn this abort into a fail.
 35726                                  
 35727                                  	;test	[fAborting],0FFh
 35728                                  	;jnz	short DoFail
 35729

 35731 00005E52 75AC                    	JNZ	short DoFail
